locations.name: Harolds Chicken Shack
locations.address: 612 S Wabash Ave, Chicago, IL 60605, USA
reviews: Food was amazing. The host taking my order was extremely polite and sweet as she could be.  It was a little slow to get but worth the wait.  Only critique I have is it smelled a little like a nursing home inside.  But the food was fantastic.

Mac and cheese chicken bowl was terrible. No flavor, pasta was hard and they melted some mozzarella cheese (at least I think) on top. Also, the wings too salty. Haroldâ€™s in name only and not quality of food. Need to eliminate some of the menu to focus more on the quality of food. Took chicken nuggets out of bowl but they were not good either.
This location seems to be better than the other ones iâ€™ve visited. I picked up my order and it was the best while eaten hot! The flavor was there and the chicken was decent. Will visit again!

They used to be good now they are nasty. My mom called about her food which was still warm btw since the large Mexican girl wanted to think it was cold. That catfish crumbled up like dust!!! My shrimp was overcooked and she didnâ€™t want to give me a refund but gave a refund on the fish. No I brought back everything but itâ€™s ok Iâ€™ll try to corporate number but Iâ€™ll dispute with my bank. Shorty thatâ€™s more money in my pockets when I call my bank

I used to be a regular here in the mid 80â€™s when I lived in Hyde Park. Loved the hot chicken with fries and hot sauce poured all over the chicken and fries. Brought back great memories 40 years later to see it was still here and same great taste.

Napakasarap ng pagkain. Napakagalang at napakabait ng host na kumuha ng order ko. Medyo mabagal ang pagdating pero sulit ang paghihintay. Ang tanging kritisismo ko lang ay medyo amoy nursing home ito sa loob. Pero napakasarap ng pagkain.

Ang Mac and cheese chicken bowl ay hindi maganda. Walang lasa, matigas ang pasta at may tinunaw na mozzarella cheese (sa tingin ko) sa ibabaw. Pati na rin, masyadong maalat ang mga pakpak. Harold's sa pangalan lamang at hindi sa kalidad ng pagkain. Kailangang alisin ang ilan sa menu para mas makapag-pokus sa kalidad ng pagkain. Tinanggal ko ang chicken nuggets sa bowl pero hindi rin masarap.
Mukhang mas maganda ang lokasyong ito kaysa sa mga napuntahan ko na. Kinuha ko ang order ko at ito ang pinakamasarap habang mainit! Naroon ang lasa at disente ang manok. Bibisita ulit ako!

Dati masarap ang mga ito ngayon ay pangit na. Tumawag ang nanay ko tungkol sa pagkain niya na mainit pa rin dahil gusto ng malaking babaeng Mehikano na isipin na malamig. Nadurog na parang alikabok ang hito!!! Nasobrahan sa luto ang hipon ko at ayaw niya akong bigyan ng refund pero ibinalik niya ang bayad sa isda. Hindi, ibinalik ko lahat pero ayos lang. Susubukan kong gamitin ang corporate number pero makikipagtalo ako sa bangko ko. Short, mas malaki ang pera ko kapag tumawag ako sa bangko ko.

Regular ako dati dito noong mid 80's noong nakatira ako sa Hyde Park. Gustung-gusto ang mainit na manok na may fries at mainit na sarsa na ibinuhos sa buong manok at fries. Ibinalik ang magagandang alaala pagkalipas ng 40 taon upang makitang narito pa rin ito at parehong mahusay na panlasa.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack West Loop
locations.address: 1501 W Madison St, Chicago, IL 60607, USA
reviews:
Ordered my food online and it was ready at the given time. There is plenty of paid street parking but if you run in and run out you can probably avoid having to pay. The cashier greeted me and he was pleasant. My order was correct. The fries and chicken were piping hot, fried correctly, and fresh.

I hadn't ate Harolds in maybe 5 years before today. I just think there are better options for the price. $10 for 4 wings and fries is a bit much to not be perfect. The chicken was hot and fresh but lacked flavor. The only seasoning I tasted was the salt and pepper I requested.

Would I eat it again? Yes. But it will probably be another 5 years.

I ordered 6 wings (mild sauce on side + hot pepper) via Uber Eats and this is what was delivered to me. 5 tiny wings and a handful of fries. For $30 on the app (I get fees and all). But what a disappointment! Please do better!

This place is extremely famous for their chicken and we were quite happy with the food! We tried their shrimp, chicken tenders, wings, green tomatoes and hush-puppies. Everything tasted good even if the mild sauce was a little too mild, adding little taste. It is possible to park in the from of the restaurant and the area looked okay. If you are in the area you should give it a try!
there food was cooked great but it was bland for my taste I would recommend the mild sauce
Always have to have Harolds Chicken when coming to the hood for a Bulls Game! Go Chicago!
El peor restaurante mucho tiempo de espera

Nag-order ng aking pagkain online at handa na ito sa ibinigay na oras. Maraming bayad na paradahan sa kalye ngunit kung tatakbo ka at maubusan ay malamang na maiiwasan mong magbayad. Binati ako ng cashier at mabait naman siya. Tama ang order ko. Ang mga fries at manok ay mainit-init, pinirito nang tama, at sariwa.

Hindi ko pa nakakain si Harolds in maybe 5 years before today. Sa tingin ko lang may mga mas mahusay na pagpipilian para sa presyo. $10 para sa 4 na pakpak at fries ay medyo marami para hindi perpekto. Ang manok ay mainit at sariwa ngunit walang lasa. Ang natikman ko lang ay ang asin at paminta na hiniling ko.

Kakainin ko ba ulit? Oo. Pero 5 years pa siguro.

Umorder ako ng 6 na pakpak (banayad na sarsa sa gilid + maanghang na sili) gamit ang Uber Eats at ito ang ipinahatid sa akin. 5 maliliit na pakpak at isang dakot na fries. Sa halagang $30 sa app (may bayad ako at lahat). Pero nakakadismaya! Sana pagbutihin pa natin!

Ang lugar na ito ay lubhang sikat para sa kanilang manok at kami ay lubos na nasiyahan sa pagkain! Sinubukan namin ang kanilang hipon, manok, pakpak, berdeng kamatis at hush-puppies. Masarap ang lahat kahit na ang mild sauce ay medyo masyadong mild, nagdaragdag ng kaunting lasa. Posibleng mag-park sa mula sa restaurant at mukhang okay ang lugar. Kung ikaw ay nasa lugar dapat mong subukan ito!

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 2132 S Michigan Ave, Chicago, IL 60616, USA
reviews: I ordered  gizzard and Wings, the wings  was great but the gizzard was if they were out the freezer microwave them fried ti add batter which might understand the wait after it was a phone order first. I tried to call but no answer and the voicemail is full. I like to have the business correct any mistakes first before I post a comment. Also a coworker on the same ordered Livers was so dark as if dark grease was used. FYI, if gizzards are not popular delete them from your menu! I would've order fish & wing.

Food is amazing, service is super slow. The ladies behind the counter have no sense of urgency, not a care in the world. Waited over an hour, as people kept coming in she would tell them that the wait is only 20 minutes. She would ask customers to speak up when ordering, but when she called the numbers she would whisper.  Management needs to do better.

ğŸ—£ï¸TRASHHHHHHHHH!

Went there to get a lemon pepper fried hard wing dinner  and salt and pepper wing dinner- started eating the chicken and saw that it was still raw on the inside- no lemon pepper in sight - no fried hard. I took it right back and  told them to look at it. Instead of them delivering good customer service and remaking  the order - they made me wait 30 mins while they made every new customer order - when I asked how much longer on the order the young woman at the woman caught an attitude.   I simply wanted to know much longer I needed to wait for a remake. 10 minutes after thisâ€¦. Then- Some crip keeper man come out the back talking about - â€œwe not gon service you no mo-â€œ at this point I just want my money back- so now we have to have a debate about that. Terrible customer service and they never know who they are servicing ğŸ˜‰. I had to tell the lady calm down at the window, stop yelling and give me money back- a whole hour+ from the initial order to returning it  to finally getting my refund. I had to go to the one on Wabash and Harrison just so I could get my kid her wings and fries. Horrible!!!

I ordered the 7 wing dinner for lunch and I expected the worst based off the reviews. Man was I wrong!  Everything was delicious! They were gracious with the amount mild sauce and lemon pepper. The mild sauce was so good that I was licking my fingers. Most Haroldâ€™s locations are hit and miss and not as good as they used to be but I am glad I tried this one. Itâ€™s a bonus that I work around the corner so I will be visiting often. It was so good that Iâ€™m placing another order for dinner when I get off work. However, I gave them 4 stars because I didnâ€™t get my cole slaw.

Update: They donâ€™t miss! I ordered the exact same thing and my order is perfectly cooked, sauced, and seasoned again! The cook/cooks for the lunch hour are excellent. Each picture is from a different order that I placed during lunch. The food is consistently good.
The perch was proper, same w the chicken.  No complaints  food is fresh and delicious, simply well done.  Don't sleep on Harolds chicken when in chicago. Take out only at this location.

Nag-order ako ng gizzard at Wings, ang ganda ng wings pero ang gizzard ay kung wala sila sa freezer microwave, pinirito sila at magdagdag ng batter na maaaring maunawaan ang paghihintay pagkatapos na ito ay isang order sa telepono. Sinubukan kong tawagan pero walang sumasagot at puno ang voicemail. Gusto kong itama muna sa negosyo ang anumang pagkakamali bago ako mag-post ng komento. Gayundin ang isang katrabaho sa parehong inutusan na si Lives ay napakaitim na parang dark grease ang ginamit. FYI, kung hindi sikat ang mga gizzards tanggalin ang mga ito sa iyong menu! O-order sana ako ng fish & wing.

Kahanga-hanga ang pagkain, napakabagal ng serbisyo. Ang mga babae sa likod ng counter ay walang pakiramdam ng pangangailangan ng madaliang pagkilos, walang pagmamalasakit sa mundo. Naghintay ng mahigit isang oras, habang patuloy na pumapasok ang mga tao, sasabihin niya sa kanila na 20 minuto lang ang paghihintay. Hihilingin niya sa mga customer na magsalita kapag nag-order, ngunit kapag tinawag niya ang mga numero ay bubulong siya.  Ang pamamahala ay kailangang gumawa ng mas mahusay.

Nagpunta doon para kumuha ng lemon pepper fried hard wing dinner at salt and pepper wing dinner- nagsimulang kainin ang manok at nakitang hilaw pa ito sa loob- walang lemon pepper sa paningin - walang pinirito nang husto. Binawi ko agad iyon at sinabihan silang tingnan ito. Sa halip na maghatid sila ng mahusay na serbisyo sa customer at muling gumawa ng order - pinahintay nila ako ng 30 minuto habang ginagawa nila ang bawat bagong order ng customer - nang tanungin ko kung gaano katagal sa order ang batang babae sa babae ay nakakuha ng saloobin.   Gusto ko lang malaman nang mas matagal na kailangan kong maghintay para sa isang muling paggawa. 10 minuto pagkatapos nitoâ€¦. Then- May lumabas na crip keeper man sa likod at pinag-uusapan - â€œwe not gon service you no mo-â€œ sa puntong ito gusto ko lang ibalik ang pera ko- kaya ngayon kailangan nating magkaroon ng debate tungkol diyan. Grabe ang customer service at hindi nila alam kung sino ang kanilang sineserbisyuhan ğŸ˜‰. Kinailangan kong sabihin sa babae na huminahon sa bintana, huminto sa pagsigaw at ibalik sa akin ang pera- isang buong oras+ mula sa unang utos hanggang sa ibalik ito hanggang sa tuluyang makuha ang aking refund. Kailangan kong pumunta sa isa sa Wabash at Harrison para lang makuha ko ang aking anak ng kanyang mga pakpak at fries. Grabe!!!

Nag-order ako ng 7 wing dinner para sa tanghalian at inaasahan ko ang pinakamasama batay sa mga review. Lalaking nagkamali ako!  Lahat ay masarap! Mabait sila sa dami ng mild sauce at lemon pepper. Napakasarap ng mild sauce kaya dinilaan ko ang aking mga daliri. Karamihan sa mga lokasyon ni Harold ay hit at miss at hindi na kasing ganda ng dati ngunit natutuwa akong sinubukan ko ang isang ito. Ito ay isang bonus na nagtatrabaho ako sa kanto kaya madalas akong bumisita. Napakabuti na naglalagay ako ng isa pang order para sa hapunan pagkaalis ko sa trabaho. Gayunpaman, binigyan ko sila ng 4 na bituin dahil hindi ko nakuha ang aking cole slaw.

Update: Hindi nila pinalampas! I-order ang eksaktong parehong bagay at ang aking order ay perpektong luto, sawsawan, at tinimplahan muli! Ang lutuin/tagapagluto para sa oras ng tanghalian ay mahusay. Ang bawat larawan ay mula sa ibang order na inilagay ko sa tanghalian. Ang pagkain ay palaging masarap.
Tama ang perch, ganoon din ang manok. Walang reklamo, sariwa at masarap ang pagkain, sadyang maayos ang pagkakaluto. Huwag matulog sa Harolds chicken kapag nasa Chicago. Dito lang i-take out.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken #55
locations.address: 129 W 87th St, Chicago, IL 60620, USA
reviews:
You can never visit Chicago without stopping at a Haroldâ€™s Chicken! This Express location is mainly takeout.  Seating is available, but itâ€™s mostly for waiting for your order.

Once I looked over the menu, I was ready to order. Iâ€™ll be honest, the ordering process was a little awkward at first. It was hard to tell if the cashier was ready, and I got a very faint â€œmay I help you.â€ I placed my order, and there was no response at first, which made me laugh a little. After a short pause, she entered the order. When I asked a question about a few of the menu items, the response was very brief. Not the warmest interaction, but hey, I was there for the food.

And the food absolutely delivered!  We ordered a 10-piece wing dinner with fries, catfish dinner with fries, and fried okra. Each order came with their signature white bread and â€œminiâ€ Cole slaw.

Everything came out hot, fresh, and cooked just right. Nothing was overcooked, the seasoning was on point, and the sauce was perfect, not too thick and not too thin.

â€œMmm deliciousâ€ is truly an understatement. Despite the minimal customer service, the food quality alone makes this spot worth it. I highly recommend this restaurant if you want classic Haroldâ€™s flavor done right.

We stopped here for early lunch.
Ordered 2-7 pc chicken wing dinners with mild sauce.
Food was up in a matter of about 20-25 minutes. Presentation was totally inviting. Yummy hot golden wings / fries with just the right amount of sauce. (drenched)
Wings were crunchy and juicy.
The fries were perfect. Oh let's not leave out that hidden slice of bread that was at the bottom covered in that special Harold's secret sauce. Entire meal was chef's kiss of carry out.  Simply delicious.

I've heard that this is the best location. I tend to agree.

I have been searching for a good Haroldâ€™s since the location on 14th and Michigan closed down. Before trying any restaurant, l always read the reviews.  Despite the 3.9 rating, I decided to give this location a try and I was highly impressed! mmmmhhhhmmmmm

Hindi ka makakapunta sa Chicago nang hindi pumupunta sa Harold's Chicken! Ang Express location na ito ay pangunahing takeout. May mga upuan, pero kadalasan ay para sa paghihintay ng order mo.

Nang tiningnan ko ang menu, handa na akong umorder. Sa totoo lang, medyo awkward ang proseso ng pag-order noong una. Mahirap malaman kung handa na ang cashier, at nakatanggap ako ng mahinang "maaari ba kitang tulungan?" Nag-order ako, at walang sumagot noong una, na medyo natawa ako. Pagkatapos ng maikling paghinto, ipinasok niya ang order. Nang magtanong ako tungkol sa ilan sa mga item sa menu, napakaikli ng tugon. Hindi ito ang pinakamainit na pakikipag-ugnayan, pero hey, naroon ako para sa pagkain.

At talagang na-deliver ang pagkain! Umorder kami ng 10-piece wing dinner na may fries, hito na may fries, at pritong okra. Bawat order ay may kasamang signature white bread at "mini" Cole slaw.

Lahat ay lumabas na mainit, sariwa, at tamang-tama ang luto. Walang nasobrahan sa luto, sarap na sarap ang timpla, at perpekto ang sarsa, hindi masyadong malapot at hindi rin masyadong malabnaw.

Ang "Mmm masarap" ay talagang kulang. Sa kabila ng kaunting serbisyo sa customer, sulit na sulit ang lugar na ito dahil sa kalidad ng pagkain. Lubos kong inirerekomenda ang restaurant na ito kung gusto mo ng klasikong lasa ng Harold's.

Huminto kami dito para sa maagang tanghalian.
Nag-order ng 2-7 pc chicken wing dinner na may mild sauce.
Naubos ang pagkain sa loob ng halos 20-25 minuto. Ang pagtatanghal ay lubos na kaakit-akit. Masarap na hot golden wings / fries na may tamang dami ng sauce. (basang-basa)
Ang mga pakpak ay malutong at makatas.
Ang mga fries ay perpekto. Naku huwag nating iwanan ang nakatagong hiwa ng tinapay na nasa ilalim na natatakpan ng espesyal na sikretong sarsa ni Harold. Buong pagkain ay halik ni chef ng carry out.  Simple lang masarap.

Narinig ko na ito ang pinakamagandang lokasyon. Ako ay madalas na sumang-ayon.

Matagal na akong naghahanap ng magandang Harold's simula nang magsara ang lokasyon sa 14th at Michigan. Bago ako sumubok ng kahit anong restaurant, lagi akong nagbabasa ng mga review. Sa kabila ng 3.9 rating, napagdesisyunan kong subukan ang lokasyong ito at humanga ako nang husto! Pumunta ako bandang 6pm noong Bisperas ng Bagong Taon at napakasikip talaga, kaya alam kong ang pagkain ay magiging MAINIT AT SARIWA!! AT GAYON NGA!!! Umorder ako ng 4 na pakpak na prito na may banayad na sarsa at black pepper. Malutong ang mga pakpak at napakalinis ng lasa - walang kakaibang aftertaste. Perpekto ang pagkaluto ng fries. Masarap ang kanilang banayad na sarsa, hindi masyadong maasim o matamis. Ang oras ng paghihintay ko ay humigit-kumulang 30 minuto na hindi naman masama kung isasaalang-alang ang araw na iyon. Mabait ang cashier at iba pang staff - walang mabahong ugali. Sa pangkalahatan, ang aking karanasan ay KAhanga-hangaâ­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸
Ito talaga ang bago kong pinupuntahang Harold's!!!ğŸ‘ğŸ½ğŸ‘ŒğŸ½ğŸ—£ï¸IKALAT ANG SALITA!!!

Hey ngayon lang nakuha ang order ko sa lokasyong ito sa unang pagkakataon sa umaga. The customer service was good but I wish the lady at front god bless her heart listened closely Sinabi ko sa kanya mild sauce on my food and lemon pepper seasoning. Salamat sa diyos nag-order ako ng sobrang banayad na sarsa ngunit naisip ko kung hindi at ang sarsa ay hindi sapat dahil wala ito tulad ng nakikita sa larawan. Ugh ayoko talaga ng dry Harold's . Mayroon akong isang bahagi ng okra ngunit muli kakulangan ng lemon pepper seasoning ay nawawala na kung ano ang aking hiniling para sa. Kaya babalik ako muli para sa isang redo. Ang pro ay sariwa ang manok ko at mainit ang pagkain. Kung magpapasya kang pumunta tiyaking MANIGAY at triple check ang iyong pagkain . Naging abala sila at naubusan sila ng mga plastic bag ngunit hindi iyon isang malaking isyu. Mabait naman yung babae sa harap at nag-order kaya I extend grace and I'll try again when I'm out that way . Nag-uugat pa rin para sa negosyong ito dahil ito yata ang pinakamagandang lokasyon .

Ilang taon akong walang Harold's Chicken. Hindi ako taong manok pero napagod ako. Madalas akong pumunta sa lokasyong ito tulad ng mga nakaraang taon. Astig ang cashier at nasa loob ang loob. It's not finna b all brand new this is Harold's Chicken ang pinag-uusapan natin sa trenches. Naging abala iyon na inaasahan. Ang manok ay disente ngunit hindi tulad ng dati noong pumunta ako 5 taon na ang nakakaraan. Kumuha ako ng half dark fries hard with mind sauce sa gilid.
Ang paborito kong Harold!! Love their sauce so baddd , basta mag-impake sa tuwing pupunta ako ngunit sulit ito !!!

Maganda ang lokasyong ito ngunit napunta sa maling direksyon! Nag-order ako ng 6 na pakpak na extra mild sauce na sinisingil sa akin para sa manok ay matigas at luma na may napakaliit na sarsa. I went bk and the was giving garbage again. 2025 na at wala bang magsasayang ng pera kaya ligtas na sabihin na hindi ko na tatangkilikin ang negosyong ito.

Sa tingin nila sila ang pinakamahusay na Harold sa lungsod. Kaya patuloy silang tumataas sa kanilang mga presyo at sa pagkakataong ito ay inilagay nila ang aking mild sauce sa gilid. Sabi ko salt paper at mild sauce never sinabi sa gilid! Masamang may-ari ng Negosyo at manggagawa kahit na pinakamasama!
Umorder ako ng 6 piece wing meal, mild. May kasama itong fries, Cole slaw, at tinapay. Napakasarap ng lahat! I will say, order a side of extra sauce kasi hindi masyadong saucy yung wings.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken #24
locations.address: 407 E 75th St, Chicago, IL 60619, USA
reviews: I called my order in the cashier told me 20 mins I took 35 mins to come. I came in no line empty still waited 8 mins. She told Me a french fry is $5 and some change, but online itâ€™s about $3. She said â€œoh well the owner need to update itâ€. This used to be my favorite one. That Lady attitude and her customer service is horrible, I see why I done walked in a couple of times and customers is cussing her out. Black business customer service needs to do better or go find something else!

The food is edible, but not the best. I didnâ€™t taste much flavor and the fish pieces were thin, however, the shrimp were pretty good. The service is not up to par as well. The house sauce/ special sauce (mild) is not mind-blowing. I couldnâ€™t finish it. And to think I was excited to eat hereâ€¦.I guess I shouldâ€™ve got the chicken. Pretty pricy as well!

Food is delicious but service is HORRIBLE. It has gotten worse over the years. What is the purpose of calling in if I still have to wait an hour for my food to cook?!? Then the clerk wanna get jazzy because I asked how much longer do I have to wait! Then tried to tell me I didnâ€™t let them know I was hereâ€¦well how did I pay for it and have a receipt in my hand?? I try my best to support my people but my people MUST do better. We donâ€™t owe you anything. YOU depend on us!

When I say never I mean never ever will I go to this Haroldâ€™s. Iâ€™m assuming they got mad because I place an online order fish 18 and wings 13 I chose the option for mild sauce on my wings and paid for extra. When I went to pick my order up I over heard the cashier taking an over the phone order and the customer was saying she didnâ€™t want the bbq sauce she wanted mild, the cashier went to explain that they do not carry the â€œoriginalâ€ Haroldâ€™s mild sauce and they only have the Haroldâ€™s bbq sauce. While I never tasted the bbq sauce my son has and he doesnâ€™t like it on his chicken, I say that because when picked my order up and heard the conversation, I explained I didnâ€™t want it on my chicken. So at the bottom of my fish this is the bread I have. When I say they had to dip this bread in grease and lay it in the tray thatâ€™s exactly what they did. I donâ€™t care what changes a customer wants to make to their order this type of behavior is never okay. This is crazy that I paid $35 for this, as a black business itâ€™s trashy and classless.

Heard about this place, decided to give it a chance.. The parking was ok. There is NO dine-in. It is a REAL whole in the wall with horrible a/c issues. The line moved super slow. There were NO PRICES posted anywhere. The staff was not especially welcoming. But, the wings were good. I purchased 4 lemon pepper wings for $12, when my order was ready, I asked for a little of the house sauce. She asked to see my receipt before she squeezed a little on my wings. I had to say, I tried the house sauce.... The wings were fresh, lightly battered, a great crisp and seasoned well, however for $12 I could've purchased 2 whole chickens and a 10 pound bag of potatoes. ğŸ˜ƒ

Now that I visited Harold's  Fried Chicken in Chicago,  I can say, I tried it. Thanks for the one time experience.  I am honored to say I supported your establishment.

Ang sama ng ugali ng babae at ang customer service niya, naiintindihan ko na kung bakit ilang beses na akong pumasok at minumura siya ng mga customer. Ang pagkain ay nakakain, ngunit hindi ang pinakamahusay. Hindi ako masyadong nakatikim ng lasa at manipis ang mga piraso ng isda, gayunpaman, ang hipon ay medyo masarap. Ang serbisyo ay hindi rin abot-kayang. Ang sarsa ng bahay/ espesyal na sarsa (mild) ay hindi nakakagulat. hindi ko ito natapos. At isipin na nasasabik akong kumain dito....I guess I should've got the chicken. Medyo pricy din!

Ang pagkain ay masarap ngunit ang serbisyo ay HORRIBLE. Ito ay lumala sa paglipas ng mga taon. Ano ang layunin ng pagtawag kung kailangan ko pang maghintay ng isang oras para maluto ang aking pagkain?!? Then the clerk wanna get jazzy kasi tinanong ko kung gaano katagal ako maghihintay! Pagkatapos ay sinubukan kong sabihin sa akin na hindi ko ipinaalam sa kanila na narito ako ... paano ko binayaran ito at may resibo sa aking kamay?? I try my best to support my people but my people MUST do better. Wala kaming utang sa iyo. Umaasa ka sa amin!

When I say never I mean never ever will I go to this Harold's. Ipinapalagay ko na nagalit sila dahil naglagay ako ng online na order ng isda 18 at mga pakpak 13 Pinili ko ang opsyon para sa banayad na sarsa sa aking mga pakpak at nagbayad ng dagdag. Nang pumunta ako para kunin ang order ko narinig ko ang cashier na kinuha ang order sa telepono at sinabi ng customer na ayaw niya ng bbq sauce na gusto niya ng mild, ipinaliwanag ng cashier na hindi nila dala ang mild sauce ni Harold at ang Harold's bbq sauce lang ang dala nila. Bagama't hindi ko natikman ang bbq sauce na mayroon ang aking anak at hindi niya ito gusto sa kanyang manok, sinasabi ko iyon dahil kapag kinuha ang aking order at narinig ang usapan, ipinaliwanag ko na hindi ko ito gusto sa aking manok. Kaya sa ilalim ng aking isda ito ang tinapay na mayroon ako. Kapag sinabi kong kailangan nilang isawsaw ang tinapay na ito sa mantika at ilagay sa tray iyon mismo ang ginawa nila. Wala akong pakialam kung anong mga pagbabago ang gustong gawin ng isang customer sa kanilang order ang ganitong uri ng pag-uugali ay hindi kailanman okay. Nakakabaliw na nagbayad ako ng $35 para dito, bilang isang itim na negosyo ito ay basura at walang klase.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack #69
locations.address: 9938 S Torrence Ave, Chicago, IL 60617, USA
reviews: Ms. Gina was a delight to speak with. She explained her way is a fresh drop when ordered. Definitely had some of the best tasting chicken.  With them dropping fresh. She said she needs 25 with anything with a bone in it.

The worst Harold's we have ever been to in our life. The staff attitude was so unprofessional and rude. We waited right at an hour for our food for it to be cold as heck after the long wait. We spent right at $70 and they gave me 1 hot/mild sauce for 4 different orders of food.
Ordered a small gizzard dinner and it was only 6 pieces in there.  Ordered 10 wings for $19.49 and had to throw it away because it wasn't fresh.
The lady attitude was jacked up because I asked her how much longer for my food and it went downhill from there. I asked for my money back but of course that was not an option.
To save from writing a book about this place, the easiest way to put it is, save your money and your time by going somewhere else if you don't want to be disappointed!

Nakakatuwang kausap si Ms. Gina. Ipinaliwanag niya na ang kanyang luto ay sariwang-sariwa kapag inorder. Talagang masarap ang manok na nabibili. Sariwa pa ang mga nahuhulog. Sabi niya, kailangan niya ng 25 na may kahit anong may buto.

Ang pinakapangit na Harold's na napuntahan namin sa buong buhay namin. Napaka-unprofessional at bastos ng mga staff. Naghintay kami ng halos isang oras bago lumamig ang pagkain namin pagkatapos ng mahabang paghihintay. Gumastos kami ng $70 at binigyan nila ako ng isang hot/mild sauce para sa apat na magkakaibang order ng pagkain.
Umorder ako ng maliit na gizzard dinner at anim na piraso lang ang laman. Umorder ako ng 10 wings sa halagang $19.49 at kinailangan ko itong itapon dahil hindi ito sariwa.
Nagalit ang dating ng babae dahil tinanong ko siya kung gaano katagal ang pagkain ko at pagkatapos noon ay nag-iba na ang takbo. Hiniling ko na ibalik ang pera ko pero siyempre hindi iyon ang opsyon.
Para makatipid sa pagsusulat ng libro tungkol sa lugar na ito, ang pinakamadaling paraan para sabihin ito ay, makatipid ng pera at oras sa pamamagitan ng pagpunta sa ibang lugar kung ayaw mong madismaya!

Lubos na nabigo sa kakulangan ng lasa!!! Walang anumang pampalasa. Malinis ang restaurant at napakahusay ng customer service!! Mainit at sariwa ang manok ngunit ito ang pinaka walang lasa na Harold's na natamo ko. Sa kasamaang palad, hindi ako babalik sa lokasyong ito.

Gina, marahil kung mas nakatuon ka sa paglikha ng positibong karanasan para sa iyong mga parokyano kaysa sa pagwawasto at pagdedebate sa kanilang mga karanasan ay makakatanggap ka ng mas magandang feedback. Kapag ang isang customer ay pumasok sa iyong tindahan, kailangan bang makipag-ugnayan sa kanila na parang nilalabag nila ang pribadong pag-aari? Pagkatapos ng mahabang araw na trabaho, sinong masipag na lalaki ang mas gustong magkaroon ng sapilitang random na pag-uusap kapag sinusubukan nilang mag-order ng hapunan? Dapat sapat na ang isang mainit, MABUTING ngiti at isang mabait na "salamat sa iyong negosyo". Binanggit ng maraming tao ang mapang-akit na saloobin na nakikita kapag nakikipag-usap ka sa kanila. Ikinalulungkot kong sabihin na hindi ako nagulat. Sana makatulong ito. Dahil sumagot ka at hindi ako makasagot, nagpatuloy ako at in-edit ang post na ito. Ginamit ko ang aking burner account para mag-iwan ng review dahil baka subukan mong gumanti nang marahas sa hitsura kung gaano kaliit ang iyong mga tugon. Tanong ko, paano mo makikilala kung sino ako at iuugnay ang komento ko sa isang taong pumasok sa isang establisyimento na may dalang alak? Parang lumilihis ka sa mga nakakatunog na post na nagbabanggit kung gaano kasama ang ugali na ipinakita mo sa mga itim na lalaki sa komunidad. Umaasa ako na makahanap ka ng kapayapaan dahil sa bilis na ito ay hindi magtatagal ang iyong negosyo.

Natuwa ako na ibinahagi ng may-ari kung paano niya pinapatakbo ang kanyang negosyo. Ginagawa niya ito nang may paggalang. Hindi ko na kinailangan pang maghintay sa labas pero naupo ako. Malinaw na nakasaad sa kanyang mga senyales ang tungkol sa paghihintay sa window ng order. Sana po ay marespeto nating lahat ang kanyang order of service.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken #88
locations.address: 124 E 35th St, Chicago, IL 60616, USA
reviews: We were in Chicago on vacation and our first stop was to Haroldâ€™s Chicken off 35th street. James the owner was super nice.  We had gizzards, liver, cat fish, coleslaw, wings and grapes with toffee. EVERYTHING was delicious!! The grapes were surprisingly delicious. The sauce did not disappoint! Iâ€™d recommend you check out Haroldâ€™s Chicken on 35th street.

I love Harold's â¤ï¸ My order was hot, fresh, and quick. The service was great from beginning to end. I ordered 2 6 piece wing dinners, which included fries and their famous mild sauce. It was delicious like always.

I went in and ordered two 6 wings. these people gave me a 4 wing and a 6 wing. I wouldâ€™ve been cool with it if they put the right stuff on top. They gave me all hot sauce and hella salt and pepper on my wings. WHO GOES TO HAROLDS AND ONLY GETS HOT SAUCE ON THEIR CHICKEN???? Haroldâ€™s is known for MILD SAUCE. The cashiers are just dumb ditzy hoâ€™s. Then they have the nerve to not answer their phone. Horrible service and horrible food. Im blew asl. Looking at my receipt she charged me for stuff i didnâ€™t asked for the lady was old but if sheâ€™s too old to comprehend simple requests then she needs to be fired.

The fried chicken and catfish were decent, but the sides were old and tough. The customer service was pretty average. There are tables available to eat at, but the atmosphere is more associated with taking your food to-go.

You walk in and see pictures of Mohammed Ali, Malcom X, Marcus Garvey, Miles Davis, and other heroes and artists. A warm, welcoming atmosphere that serves as a cultural foundation in the community. The food was excellent. My co-workers and I got the 3 wing special with a pop. Chicken was perfectly cooked, and it, along with the fries, had the right amount of mild sauce. A wonderful experience for lunch. I plan on coming again.

Nasa Chicago kami noong bakasyon at ang una naming hinto ay sa Harold's Chicken sa 35th street. Si James ang may-ari ay sobrang bait.  Mayroon kaming mga gizzards, atay, isda ng pusa, coleslaw, pakpak at ubas na may toffee. LAHAT ay masarap!! Ang mga ubas ay nakakagulat na masarap. Hindi nabigo ang sarsa! Inirerekomenda kong tingnan mo ang Harold's Chicken sa ika-35 na kalye.

I love Harold's â¤ï¸ Mainit, sariwa, at mabilis ang order ko. Napakaganda ng serbisyo mula simula hanggang wakas. Nag-order ako ng 2 6 piece wing dinner, na may kasamang fries at ang kanilang sikat na mild sauce. Ito ay masarap tulad ng dati.

Pumasok ako at umorder ng dalawang 6 wings. Binigyan ako ng mga taong ito ng 4 wing at 6 wing. Okay lang sana sa akin kung tamang sarsa ang nilagyan nila. Puro hot sauce ang nilagyan nila ng wings at sobrang asin at paminta. SINO BA ANG PUPUNTA SA HAROLDS AT MALAPIT LANG ANG MAINIT NA SAUCE SA MANOK NILA???? Kilala ang Harold's sa MILD SAUCE. Puro mga bobo ang mga cashier. Tapos ang lakas ng loob nilang hindi sagutin ang telepono nila. Pangit ang serbisyo at pangit ang pagkain. Nababaliw ako. Nang tingnan ko ang resibo ko, sinisingil niya ako para sa mga bagay na hindi ko naman hiniling. Matanda na ang babae, pero kung masyado na siyang matanda para umintindi ng mga simpleng kahilingan, dapat siyang tanggalin sa trabaho.

Ang pritong manok at hito ay disente, ngunit ang mga gilid ay luma at matigas. Ang serbisyo sa customer ay medyo karaniwan. May mga mesa na magagamit upang kumain, ngunit ang kapaligiran ay mas nauugnay sa pagkuha ng iyong pagkain upang pumunta.

Maglalakad ka at makita ang mga larawan ni Mohammed Ali, Malcom X, Marcus Garvey, Miles Davis, at iba pang mga bayani at artista. Isang mainit, nakakaengganyang kapaligiran na nagsisilbing pundasyon ng kultura sa komunidad. Ang pagkain ay napakahusay. Nakuha namin ng mga katrabaho ko ang 3 wing special na may pop. Ang manok ay perpektong luto, at ito, kasama ang mga fries, ay may tamang dami ng banayad na sarsa. Isang magandang karanasan para sa tanghalian. Plano kong pumunta ulit.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack #35
locations.address: 12700 S Halsted St, Chicago, IL 60628, USA
reviews:
My first time ordering here. I went in it wasn't very crowded. I saw 3 people waiting. THE MUSIC was blasting I could barely hear the lady taking my order. Ordered 5 wings salt pepper mild on side. They call my number I showed the ticket. I was surprised the order came out quickly I didn't think nothing of it.
Got home realized They gave me 4 Wings instead of 5. Tried to call no one answered and the phone kept hanging up. I will Not come to this location again. ğŸ˜¤ Bad Service and my chicken was cold. Im sure they gave me the wrong order.
Amazing chicken. They also sell deep fried catfish and they are really good. The location is a bit far from Downtown but still reachable. Must try place if you are in Chicago.

I did not enjoy my experience here. I followed the hype, from Tik Tok, and wanted to get a taste of Chicago. I ordered the 4 piece wings and fries. I threw my fries in the trash. My fries were not hot. The chicken is mediocre. Nothing that made me feel like it was good chicken. Honestly,it felt like a waste. Iâ€™m open to trying another time and maybe another location one day.

Ordered 18 wings waited 20 minutesâ€¦ cool! Get the food it wasnâ€™t hot as if they just fried itâ€¦ get home itâ€™s pieces of paper in it and it looks as if they broke down orders they had that people hadnâ€™t picked up and made me a an 18 pieceâ€¦ fries werenâ€™t hot and they put so much sauce on it to try to cover up the fact that it wasnâ€™t fresh chickenâ€¦ the sauce isnâ€™t what it use to be it was kinda bitterâ€¦ big disappointment had to put it in the air fryer because I didnâ€™t want to hand it back and they play with it or get a refund and go somewhere else because it wasnâ€™t fresh chicken already after 10pmâ€¦. But I will not be getting anything else from this location!!!! Theyâ€™re supposed to have insurance for spoilage not push it off on a loyal customerâ€¦.sad!!!

The food and service was great, but while I was ordering, a man that works here came in loudly yelling and cursing at the lady that was taking my order and everyone in the lobby could hear him yelling. The man in back was extremely unprofessional and abusive to the lady that was taking orders. Iâ€™m not sure if heâ€™s a manager, but if he is he needs to be fired immediately.  Your employees should not be subject to that kind of abuse. This happened on 12/20 around 2:45pm.

First time kong mag-order dito. Pumasok ako hindi naman masyadong crowded. May nakita akong 3 tao na naghihintay. Pumutok ang musika halos hindi ko marinig na kinuha ng ginang ang order ko. Nag-order ng 5 wings salt pepper mild on side. Tumawag sila sa number ko ipinakita ko ang ticket. Nagulat ako ng mabilis na lumabas ang order hindi ko na inisip iyon.
Got home realized Binigyan nila ako ng 4 Wings imbes na 5. Sinubukan kong tawagan walang sumasagot at patuloy na binababa ang telepono. Hindi na ako babalik sa lugar na ito. ğŸ˜¤ Bad Service at malamig ang manok ko. Im sure mali yung order nila sakin.

Kamangha-manghang manok. Nagtitinda din sila ng deep fried catfish at ang galing talaga. Medyo malayo ang lokasyon sa Downtown pero mapupuntahan pa rin. Dapat subukan ang lugar kung ikaw ay nasa Chicago.

Hindi ko nagustuhan ang karanasan ko rito. Sinundan ko ang hype mula sa Tik Tok, at gusto kong matikman ang Chicago. Umorder ako ng 4-piece wings at fries. Itinapon ko ang fries ko sa basurahan. Hindi maanghang ang fries ko. Karaniwan lang ang manok. Walang nakapagparamdam sa akin na masarap ang manok. Sa totoo lang, parang sayang lang. Bukas ako sa pagsubok sa ibang pagkakataon at baka sa ibang lokasyon balang araw.

Nag-order ng 18 wings naghintay ng 20 minuto... cool! Kunin ang pagkain na hindi mainit na parang pinirito lang nila ito... umuwi ito ay mga piraso ng papel sa loob nito at mukhang sinira nila ang mga order nila na hindi kinuha ng mga tao at ginawa akong 18 piraso... hindi mainit ang mga fries at nilagyan nila ito ng napakaraming sarsa upang subukang pagtakpan ang katotohanan na hindi ito sariwang manok... ang sarsa ay hindi ito nabibigo sa manok ... sa air fryer dahil ayaw kong ibalik ito at nilalaro nila ito o kumuha ng refund at pumunta sa ibang lugar dahil hindi pa ito sariwang manok pagkatapos ng 10pmâ€¦. Ngunit wala akong makukuhang iba pa mula sa lokasyong ito!!!! Dapat silang magkaroon ng insurance para sa pagkasira hindi itutulak ito sa isang tapat na customerâ€¦.sad!!!

locations.address: 713 Roosevelt Rd, Maywood, IL 60153, USA
reviews: I spent $75 and the fish was not done. When I took it back I ask to trade for their tea. The man behind the counter told me no because the tea is $7.00. I just feel if a customer is telling that there food wasnâ€™t right you should accommodate that customer. I will never eat here again.
Newer location. I visted the opening week. They had a 10 piece wing special. Food was hot/fresh. Good taste.
Food very good well done and fresh thank you so much to open this place in maywood I love Harolds chicken

We purchased 4 chicken meals. Upon getting home and trying the chicken, the skin was tough and chewy. The food was inedible. We also noticed parts of the chicken were mushy and one thigh had an off taste. Also, the fries were old and the bread was stale. We decided to not let anyone touch the remaining two meals. The following day my husband took back the remaining two meals which they replaced with two three-wing chicken .meals as opposed to refunding the money or replacing the entire order. I must admit the wings were good, but the fries one again were old and the bread stale as ever. Oddly, the fries were a mixture of crinkle-cut and regular fries. What food establishment does this?  This is so tacky. Needless to say, we will never go here again or recommend this place to anyone. This is not the Haroldâ€™s Chicken we know and love. Weâ€™ll continue to go to the Chicago Haroldâ€™s Southside locations. Broadview Health Department where are you?

Food wasnâ€™t good at all. Chicken was soggy and French fries were undercooked. Mild sauce was tasteless. I do not recommend and will not be returning. Then on top of that one of the workers had the nerve to be passing out expired cookies to customers. Also it didnâ€™t smell like a restaurant inside smh. Atmosphere was not clean.

Gumastos ako ng $75 at hindi pa luto ang isda. Nang ibalik ko ito, hiniling kong ipagpalit sa tsaa nila. Hindi ako pinayagan ng lalaki sa likod ng counter dahil $7.00 ang tsaa. Sa tingin ko, kung may customer na nagsasabi na hindi masarap ang pagkain nila, dapat mong pagbigyan ang customer na iyon. Hindi na ako kakain dito ulit.
Mas bagong lokasyon. Binisita ko ang opening week. Nagkaroon sila ng 10 piece wing special. Mainit/sariwa ang pagkain. Magandang lasa.

Bumili kami ng apat na putahe ng manok. Pag-uwi at pagtikim ng manok, matigas at chewy ang balat. Hindi na nakakain ang pagkain. Napansin din namin na malambot ang ilang bahagi ng manok at may kakaibang lasa ang isang hita. Luma na rin ang fries at luma na ang tinapay. Napagpasyahan naming huwag hayaang hawakan ninuman ang natitirang dalawang putahe. Kinabukasan, binawi ng asawa ko ang natitirang dalawang putahe at pinalitan nila ng dalawang three-wing chicken meals, sa halip na ibalik ang pera o palitan ang buong order. Aaminin kong masarap ang wings, pero luma na naman ang fries at luma na rin ang tinapay gaya ng dati. Kakaiba, ang fries ay pinaghalong crinkle-cut at regular fries. Anong establisyimento ang gumagawa nito? Napaka-last nito. Siyempre, hindi na kami pupunta rito muli o irerekomenda ang lugar na ito sa kahit sino. Hindi ito ang Harold's Chicken na kilala at paborito namin. Patuloy kaming pupunta sa mga lokasyon ng Chicago Harold's Southside. Broadview Health Department, nasaan ka?

Ang pagkain ay hindi maganda sa lahat. Ang manok ay basa at ang French fries ay kulang sa luto. Walang lasa ang mild sauce. Hindi ko inirerekomenda at hindi na babalik. At higit pa rito, ang isa sa mga manggagawa ay nagkaroon ng lakas ng loob na magpasa ng mga nag-expire na cookies sa mga customer. Hindi rin ito amoy restaurant sa loob ng smh. Hindi malinis ang kapaligiran.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 9151 S Ashland Ave, Chicago, IL 60620, USA
reviews: I used to be a Harold's chicken addict. I could tell you which chicken shack had the best chicken, which one had the best gizzards. This chicken shack food I ordered on 5/5/25 was terrible. I should have had tacos. I ordered the chicken and gizzard combo with mild sauce. I was told 15 mins the food would be ready. When I got to my destination and opened the bag. I didn't know if they gave me a chicken or a Cornish hen wing. The wings were so small. The fries were half sized. My friend asked me,'Did they have any whole french fries?' I laughed. The gizzards were just ok. The two wings on the picture made its way to the garbage, along with some fries and gizzards. I don't have to return to this location. I know a bar that sells chicken wings and gizzards MUCH better than this Harold's.

When I placed my order the cook was distracted by a phone call about his family members in Danville and selling their furniture. While listening to his call and the wait time for my order, I knew my order would be wrong!!! The woman that worked the register asked him what was the order in front of her and he said gizzard and wing combo. She informed him that it was a large gizzard and 6 wings he told her to just take the wings off!!! None the less my large gizzard is now a small gizzard I wanted them fried soft and they are hard as bricksâ€¦. The cook had the nerve to open the door to tell me that a large gizzard come in a combo. No refunds and no recooking even if they messed up your order!!!!! Used to be my favorite but, Iâ€™m never going back!!!!

My people we got to do better, lets not say we cook to order and refry the same wings you cooked this morning. I paid for 40 bucks for 16 wings and 2 hot peppers, I shouldâ€™ve checked my food but I was so hungry that I was ready to go home and eat. Got to my location and they had given me some old chicken. To top it off the lady who took my order was outside smoking a cigarette and didnâ€™t wash her hands when she returned. Luckily someone else came in and packed my chicken. This experience has been a first for this location but unfortunately I will not be patronizing this location ever again. Please do better Haroldâ€™s chicken #4
This is the spot for some fire fried chicken. So tasty and fresh. Can't wait until next time!

Had to wait at least 20 minutes for 4 wings- unheard of. Then on top of that some of the wings were deformed and the sauce was absolutely atrocious. It was definitely not the regular Chicago mild sauce. Itâ€™s very sweet and tastes like jelly and syrup or something. This Haroldâ€™s is terrible please keep driving to another location.

Dati akong adik sa manok ni Harold. Masasabi ko na kung aling chicken shack ang may pinakamasarap na manok, alin ang may pinakamasarap na bakol. Napakasama ng pagkaing ito sa chicken shack na inorder ko noong 5/5/25. Dapat sana ay tacos ang kinain ko. Umorder ako ng chicken at bakol combo na may banayad na sarsa. Sinabihan ako na 15 minuto ay handa na ang pagkain. Pagdating ko sa destinasyon ko at binuksan ang bag, hindi ko alam kung manok o Cornish hen wing ang ibinigay nila sa akin. Napakaliit ng mga pakpak. Kalahating laki lang ang fries. Tinanong ako ng kaibigan ko, 'Mayroon ba silang buong french fries?' Natawa ako. Ok lang naman ang mga bakol. Napunta sa basurahan ang dalawang pakpak sa larawan, kasama ang ilang fries at bakol. Hindi ko na kailangang bumalik sa lugar na ito. May alam akong bar na nagbebenta ng chicken wings at bakol na MAS MASARAP kaysa sa Harold's na ito.

Nang mag-order ako, naagaw ng atensyon ng kusinero ang atensyon dahil sa isang tawag sa telepono tungkol sa mga kapamilya niya sa Danville at sa pagbebenta ng kanilang mga muwebles. Habang nakikinig sa tawag niya at sa tagal ng paghihintay sa order ko, alam kong mali ang order ko!!! Tinanong siya ng babaeng nag-iimpake kung ano ang order sa harap niya at sinabi niyang combo ng gizzard at wing. Sinabihan siya ng babae na malaking gizzard iyon at anim na pakpak. Sinabihan niya itong tanggalin na lang ang mga pakpak!!! Gayunpaman, ang malaking gizzard ko ay isa nang maliit na gizzard ngayon. Gusto ko sanang iprito nang malambot at matigas na parang ladrilyoâ€¦. Naglakas-loob ang kusinero na buksan ang pinto para sabihin sa akin na may malaking gizzard na kasama sa combo. Walang refund at walang lulutuing muli kahit na magkamali sila sa order mo!!!!! Dati paborito ko 'yan pero hindi na ako babalik!!!!

Aking mga tao, kailangan nating pagbutihin, huwag nating sabihing nagluluto tayo para mag-order at mag-refrigerate ng parehong mga pakpak na niluto mo kaninang umaga. I paid for 40 bucks for 16 wings and 2 hot peppers, I shouldâ€™ve checked my food but I was so hungry that I had ready to go home and eat. Nakarating ako sa kinaroroonan ko at binigyan nila ako ng lumang manok. To top it off ang babaeng kumuha ng order ko ay nasa labas na humihitit ng sigarilyo at hindi naghuhugas ng kamay nang bumalik siya. Buti na lang may pumasok at nag-impake ng manok ko. Ang karanasang ito ay naging una para sa lokasyong ito ngunit sa kasamaang-palad ay hindi ko na muling tatangkilikin ang lokasyong ito. Mangyaring pagbutihin ang manok ni Harold #4
Dito ang tamang lugar para sa pritong manok. Napakasarap at sariwa. Hindi na makapaghintay sa susunod!

Kinailangang maghintay ng hindi bababa sa 20 minuto para sa 4 na pakpak- hindi pa naririnig. Pagkatapos ay sa itaas ng ilan sa mga pakpak ay na-deform at ang sarsa ay ganap na mabangis. Talagang hindi ito ang regular na Chicago mild sauce. Ito ay napakatamis at lasa tulad ng jelly at syrup o isang bagay. Grabe itong Harold's please keep driving to another location.
Koi

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Hyde Park
locations.address: Kimbark Plaza Parking Lot, 1208 E 53rd St, Chicago, IL 60615, USA
reviews: Normally I can order my food and pick it up without a problem but today when I went to pick up my order, I tried to tell one of the women, looks to be in her 40s, that I made an order and when I said my name, she ignored me and started calling numbers from 62 to 67, and then another woman walks up and said she called in an order, now another woman in the back gets her food and Iâ€™m trying to get mine after her but the older woman just calling numbers, still ignoring me. I finally tell the younger woman I ordered through grub hub and I tell her my name like I told the other woman and she gets my food for me. I donâ€™t know what the older ladyâ€™s problem was but she needs to get better customer service skills or stop working the register. It doesnâ€™t take a lot just to learn to listen  and stop ignoring people especially when theyâ€™re not disrespectful. I wonâ€™t be coming back here ever again.
I purchased 5 wings and they were pretty decent but the fries were hard, dry, and some what soggy. Can't eat chicken from harolds if fries not right. Places since Covid have really went down

Great tasting chicken but, damn do the employees have to pay for sauce out of pocket? This chicken is way too dry for the price!! Also, if you ask for more sauce they force you to buy extra in a cup which is not the same and defeats the purpose of adding sauce while the food is hot! Iâ€™m giving a 1 star because, this is not how original Haroldâ€™s is served!

Not going to lie I gave up on this Haroldâ€™s years ago because the food quality and service had fallen off. But today I decided to give it another chance and ordered 15 wings. The line was long but they were moving people in and out quick. And honestlyâ€¦ they made a comeback. The chicken was fye, fresh, and crunchy just how I like it. Even my 5-year-old said Mama this chicken fye

I ordered a fourth white with just lemon pepper I received what looked like a fried rat with a bunch of sauce ,this Harolds has went really down and when you try to call, they donâ€™t pick up the phone. I wouldnâ€™t recommend this place at all.

Karaniwan ay nakakapag-order ako ng pagkain at nakukuha ko ito nang walang problema. Pero ngayon, noong kukunin ko na ang order ko, sinubukan kong sabihin sa isa sa mga babae, na mukhang nasa edad 40, na may order ako. Nang sabihin ko ang pangalan ko, hindi niya ako pinansin at tinawagan ang mga numero mula 62 hanggang 67. May lumapit na isa pang babae at sinabing tinawag niya ang order. Ngayon, may isa pang babae sa likod na kumuha ng pagkain niya at sinusubukan kong kunin ang akin, pero tumatawag lang ang matandang babae ng numero, hindi pa rin ako pinapansin. Sa wakas, sinabi ko sa nakababatang babae na umorder ako gamit ang grub hub at sinabi ko sa kanya ang pangalan ko tulad ng sinabi ko sa isa pang babae at siya ang kumuha ng pagkain ko. Hindi ko alam kung ano ang problema ng matandang babae pero kailangan niyang pagbutihin ang customer service skills o tumigil na sa pagiging matino. Hindi naman kailangan ng maraming oras para lang matutong makinig at tumigil sa pagbalewala sa mga tao lalo na kung hindi naman sila masungit. Hindi na ako babalik dito.

Bumili ako ng limang pakpak at maayos naman ang mga ito pero matigas, tuyo, at medyo malabnaw ang fries. Hindi makakain ng manok mula sa Harolds kung hindi tama ang fries. Bumaba na talaga ang mga lugar simula noong Covid.

Ang sarap ng lasa ng manok pero, damn kailangan bang magbayad ng mga empleyado para sa sauce mula sa bulsa? Ang manok na ito ay masyadong tuyo para sa presyo!! At saka, kung hihingi ka pa ng sauce pinipilit ka nilang bumili ng extra sa isang cup na hindi pareho at tinatalo ang layunin ng pagdaragdag ng sauce habang mainit ang pagkain! Nagbibigay ako ng 1 star dahil, hindi ganito ang orihinal na paghahain ng Harold!

Hindi magsisinungaling, sumuko ako sa Harold na ito maraming taon na ang nakalipas dahil ang kalidad ng pagkain at serbisyo ay bumagsak. Ngunit ngayon nagpasya akong bigyan ito ng isa pang pagkakataon at nag-order ng 15 mga pakpak. Mahaba ang pila pero mabilis silang naglalabas-masok ng mga tao. At sa totoo lang... nag-comeback sila. Ang manok ay fye, sariwa, at malutong kung paano ko ito gusto. Kahit ang 5-year-old ko sabi ni Mama this chicken fye

Nag-order ako ng pang-apat na puti na may lamang lemon na paminta Nakatanggap ako ng parang piniritong daga na may isang bungkos ng sarsa, itong si Harolds ay talagang bumaba at kapag sinubukan mong tawagan, hindi nila kinuha ang telepono. Hindi ko irerekomenda ang lugar na ito.

Sinasabing magsasara kayo ng 1pm... Papasok ako ng @12:22 sa isang Sabado at sinabi ng taong nagprito ng manok, tapos na kami. Habang nagpiprito siya ng manok... Sa kanto lang ako nakatira... At madalas pumunta dito... But this blew my mind that your door is open and I can walk in but you stop cooking 38 minutes early.... Hindi na ako babalik.... To be honest they don't deserve my money. Higit pa...

ğŸ—£ğŸ—£ğŸ—£ Itong Harold dito mismo sa gas station na ito ay MASARAP!!  Dahil wala na ang galit na babae, sinasagot pa ang mga phone ğŸ™ŒğŸ¾ğŸ™ŒğŸ¾ğŸ™ŒğŸ¾. Ang aking manok ay bagong handa, at sa paraang inorder ko ito! Kung naghahanap ka ng MASARAP na pagkain, ito ang lokasyong pupuntahan.

Ang huling karanasan ko sa Harold's ay noong ika-35 at Indiana ğŸ‘ğŸ¾ STRAIGHT TRASH. Huwag mong sayangin ang iyong pera.

Gusto ko ang lokasyon ni Harold! Para sa $20, maaari kang magpakain ng 2-4 ppl. Palagi akong nag-order ng dalawang kalahati ng madilim, at nagbibigay sila ng 2 piraso nang libre. 10pcs chicken yan, 6 slice bread, 3 coleslaw minis, at 3 servings ng fries. Gumagana ito!  kapag nagmamadali ka at kulang ang budget not to mention sunog ang pagkain!!!

Sinubukan ang lokasyong ito on the fly- napakasarap ng pagkain! Lahat ay sariwa! Pero sabi sa akin ng kaibigan ko nakalimutan nila ang paminta ko, pero first time dito natamaan!!! Gustung-gusto ang bawat bit ng aking 6 na pakpak na may fries!!! Tiyak na babalik, mangyaring ipagpatuloy ang mabuting gawain!

Tinanong ko ang kahera, "Pwede ba akong bumili ng ibang bangka na ginagamit nila para ilagay ang pagkain dahil umorder ako ng walong piraso na may banayad na sarsa, asin at paminta sa mga prito, at dagdag na lemon pepper lang sa manok." Sabi niya, "HINDI." "Hindi, hindi." "Ayoko kasi kung paano nila isinasalansan ang manok nila sa ibabaw ng mga prito at nilalagyan lang ng banayad na sarsa ang lahat." Pag-uwi ko, meron akong lapot na manok at gustong-gusto ko ang crispy chicken.

Mind you this is my 10th time eating at this one will not order from here again chicken didnâ€™t look like it normally does either highly frustrated
It was great and the $2 chicken only on Tuesday and $1.50 on Wednesday is great for everybody in need of some good fried chicken! So your and fresh made to order! Right on time!

Today was my first time here and I must say that the food was good,  hot, fresh, and  the service was speedy! They give you a nice amount of fries, one piece of bread, and cole slaw upon request. Definitely will go back and the inside was clean of you wanted to eat in there! Parking is hard to get since it's other businesses in that small area!

One of my favorite Haroldâ€™s! Iâ€™ve never had an issue ordering ahead and picking up. The food has been consistentâ€¦except the okra. Please change be back to the original okra. Thank you to the staff for being great always!

Bibigyan ka nila ng maraming fries, isang piraso ng tinapay, at cole slaw kapag hiniling. Tiyak na babalik at malinis ang loob ng gusto mong kumain doon! Mahirap makakuha ng paradahan dahil ibang negosyo ito sa maliit na lugar na iyon!

Isa sa mga paborito kong Harold! Hindi pa ako nagkaroon ng isyu sa pag-order nang maaga at pagkuha. Ang pagkain ay pare-pareho...maliban sa okra. Mangyaring baguhin na bumalik sa orihinal na okra. Salamat sa mga tauhan sa pagiging mahusay palagi!

Kakarating ko lang sa Chicago Midway Airport, at gutom na ako. Ako ay isang katutubong ng Chicago, at alam ko kung saan mahahanap ang mga kainan. Ang mga pakpak na ito ay nasa punto. Sapat na sinabi.  ğŸ—

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 7348 S Stony Island Ave, Chicago, IL 60649, USA
reviews:
I was in this Harolds on 12/12 2026 at 610pm. The young lady at the register was counting her drawer down. She never acknowledged me waiting to order.  But the part was when she walked away came back, walked away again and sat down on her phone and never said anything.  When I said excuse me, she came back to the window and said nothing, holding her phone. I walked out. My 11 year old son looked at me and said "why are they so rude to people everytime we are in here. Then he said "that lady was extra rude for no reason". I hope the manager/owner reads this because she should not work with the public. We come here alot and the service has never be good ,but the food was fresh. I would never recommend this Harolds again.
Former customer:(

Their service is the worst part of the experience. In addition to lying about their wait times (often taking an additional 1.5 hours for 1 simple order), their actually employees are unpleasant, nonchalant and unprofessional. Itâ€™s disheartening to see a spot that was once able to be counted on for their punctuality and professionalism be ruined and turned into a disgrace to the Haroldâ€™s franchise.
I had an awful experience with my first visit to Harolds Chicken last yr. So I was advised to try this location. It was amazing if there is one better than this i want to see it.

I made the mistake of ordering from DoorDash, and I paid for the express shipping of my order. However, delivery on this day was free, with a 46-minute time estimate.  That was flag number one.  Now it is an hour later and 2 drivers later...still  NO FOOD. And the bill was over $50.00.  NEVER AGAIN!!  NEVER!!

They are rude they are slow. Cashier who claims to be the manager charged me $2 for lemon pepper then was on the phone yapping the whole time DID NOT put lemon pepper on the chicken when I told her I donâ€™t see or taste it she said she put it on there. Yes I know lemon pepper has tendency to dissolve but this is not even 3 mins after I got it and it took 20 mins to get the chicken you can see on the paper thereâ€™s no lemon pepper as well. The chicken was cold as well. She then said she couldnâ€™t put any lemon pepper on there without charging me another $1.

Nasa Harolds na ito ako noong 12/12 2026 nang 610pm. Binibilang ng dalaga sa rehistro ang kanyang drawer. Hindi niya ako kinilala na naghihintay na mag-order.  Ngunit ang bahagi ay kapag siya ay lumayo ay bumalik, lumakad muli at umupo sa kanyang telepono at hindi nagsalita ng kahit ano.  Nang sabihin kong excuse me, bumalik siya sa bintana at walang sinabi, hawak ang phone niya. Nag walk out ako. My 11 year old son looked at me and said "why are they so rude to people everytime we are in here. Then he said "that lady was extra rude for no reason". Sana basahin ito ng manager/owner dahil hindi siya dapat magtrabaho kasama ang publiko. We come here alot and the service has never be good , but the food was fresh. I would never recommend this Harolds again.
Dating customer :(

Mahigit 13 taon na akong pumupunta rito sa Harold's, at taon-taon ay lalong lumalala ang sitwasyon kaya't nauwi sila sa kinalalagyan nila ngayon - sa banyo. Ang kanilang serbisyo ang pinakamasamang bahagi ng karanasan. Bukod sa pagsisinungaling tungkol sa kanilang oras ng paghihintay (madalas ay inaabot ng karagdagang 1.5 oras para sa isang simpleng order), ang kanilang mga empleyado ay hindi kaaya-aya, walang pakialam, at hindi propesyonal. Nakakalungkot makita na ang isang lugar na dating maaasahan dahil sa kanilang pagiging nasa oras at propesyonalismo ay nasisira at naging kahihiyan sa prangkisa ng Harold's.

Nagkaroon ako ng hindi magandang karanasan sa una kong pagbisita sa Harolds Chicken noong nakaraang taon. Kaya pinayuhan akong subukan ang lugar na ito. Nakakamangha kung may mas maganda pa rito, gusto ko itong makita.

Nagkamali ako na umorder sa DoorDash, at binayaran ko ang express shipping ng order ko. Pero libre ang delivery sa araw na ito, na may 46 minutong estimate. Iyon ang unang dapat tandaan. Ngayon, isang oras na ang lumipas at dalawang driver na ang lumipas...WALANG PAGKAIN pa rin. At ang bayarin ay mahigit $50.00 na. HINDI NA ULIT!! HINDI NA KAILANMAN!!

Masungit sila mabagal sila. Cashier who claims to be the manager charged me $2 for lemon pepper then was on the phone yapping the whole time AY HINDI naglagay ng lemon pepper sa manok nang sabihin ko sa kanya na hindi ko nakikita o natitikman ito sabi niya nilagay niya ito doon. A little history here. I've been going here since the other one across the Expressway closed. And I had to say I was very impressed. Food was hot sauce, was tasty. Wings were a good size service.
Was good, but recently that I mean within the last.

She was back in the restaurant within 8 minutes or so.  She came back in and complained to the staff that her wings were awfully salty. I didn't pay too much attention but I did hear Her. And upon her complaint, the staff Beth didn't refund her order. They were just saying well. No, it's not salty.  And I was like, wow, unfortunate for her, but as time passed, I got my order, I decided to sit in there. I like the ambiance. So no problem with the exception of a few flies that smell the sauce and.

Food was hot.  Just a perfect amount of sauce. Not drenched and not extremely decided to go ahead. It's just the seasoning that they put in, because you said no soul. Yes, but man, it's salty, are you listening staff was combative argumentative and decided to say okay, might have been just one wing and I taste it  But no once I gain composer shut down, finish 2 to 3 more wings with some fries fries by the way, paddle salt, but the audacity of this person to tell me that it's not salty, and there is a salty witness before me who complained.  I said wow. This must be under new ownership. So I granted an eyebrow and I just enjoyed the sauce. But salty salty is the word to. Day no upon coming back within the next month or so same result salt. Once again, I mentioned it to the staff. Once again, oh.  It must be when they seize in the chicken. No matter the excuse fix it. I'm saying to myself, so show about a month or 2 later came back. Same result salty so either. I don't know if it's new management. New workers new recipe or just plain sabotage is what I'm thinking.  But go and try it and enjoy your salty chicken with the family of flies that I'm sure we'll be there. Well, upon my next visit.

I was looking forward to this food all day and Iâ€™m extremely upset with the service I received. First of all, I placed my order to be picked up at 10pm. It was a 8 wing with two sauces on the side. Simple right? I guess not. One would assume that means the order wouldnâ€™t be made until near the pickup time the customer selects. I literally walked in AT 10pm on the dot and was told that my food had been sitting there for awhile. I then told the lady that well I placed my order to be picked up at 10pm which is SHOWS on the receipt. She told me it was still a little warm but she then asked the guy in the back if he had 8 wings he could make and he acted like it was a problem and he couldnâ€™t do it. Iâ€™m not the type to be a difficult customer or make a scene and she told me it was warm so I just let it go. I get home and my food is ICE COLD. THEN on top of that they didnâ€™t even put my two sauces in the bag. So I paid nearly 25 bucks for ice cold chicken and couldnâ€™t even get the sauces I paid for. What is the purpose of selecting a pickup time if youâ€™re going to completely disregard it and make the meal way earlier when you feel like it to just get it out the way from what it seems. My food had to have been sitting for at least 20 plus minutes for how cold it was. Iâ€™m extremely upset. Iâ€™ll know next time to just be the difficult costumer who pushes the issue if I ever even decide to come here again to begin withğŸ—‘ï¸ğŸš®

I ordered a large gizzard and they were dirty. I mean, you know the bottom of the gizzard that piece you pull off it was on my fried gizzard. They never took it off. Also you could barely chew it because it was just that hard. I also ordered a white half and they gave me a dark half. There was only one other person in there when I was ordering my food.. So itâ€™s not like they were busy.

First I donâ€™t like giving bad reviews but I should have know something was wrong ordering online and it was ready in about 10-15 minutes. I specifically said do not fry hard , lemon pepper and mild sauce. None!

I ordered two extra sides of mild sauce , gave a tip , it was not a freshly cooked ordered, you can tell it was refried or itâ€™s old and been sitting, as high as food is, why would people do things like this to peopleâ€™s orders, thus is not good customer service and Iâ€™m pretty sure if the shoe was on the other foot they would feel the same way.

I understand mistakes can happen but at the expense of how high food is and the health of a customer , it is not right or professional.

It has me feeling sick to my stomach and the money I spent.

This needs to be discussed and changes made immediately.

I ordered 7 wings with hot and mild sauce. The meal was horrible. The worst Iâ€™ve had there. Iâ€™ve HONESTLY had 2 day leftover chicken that I reheated that was better.
No excuse for a order that I placed and waited for at 12:30pm during peak lunch time.

Isang maliit na kasaysayan dito. Papunta na ako dito since nagsara yung isa sa kabilang Expressway. At kailangan kong sabihin na labis akong humanga. Ang pagkain ay mainit na sarsa, ay masarap. Ang Wings ay isang magandang laki ng serbisyo.
Mabuti, ngunit kamakailan ang ibig kong sabihin sa loob ng huli.
Tenga, mahal. 3 beses na akong pumasok. Unang beses ko sa loob ng nakaraang taon, naganap ang isang insidente kung saan ako nag-order. At isang babae ang pumasok at kumuha ng kanyang order pagkakuha ng kanyang pagkain. Bumalik siya sa restaurant sa loob ng 8 minuto o higit pa.  Bumalik siya at nagreklamo sa mga tauhan na ang kanyang mga pakpak ay napakaalat. Hindi ko masyadong pinansin pero narinig ko siya. At sa kanyang reklamo, hindi ni-refund ng staff na si Beth ang kanyang order. Buti lang sinabi nila. Hindi, hindi ito maalat.  And I was like, wow, unfortunate for her, but as time passed, I got my order, I decided to sit in there. Gusto ko ang ambiance. Kaya walang problema maliban sa ilang langaw na amoy sarsa at.
Ako ay sasali. Karaniwan ba akong nakakakuha ng 5 hanggang 7 pakpak na nagbubukas ng bag sa pakete?  Alam mo kung paano ito ay basa at saucy na papel. Pakikinig sa Araw ng mga talahanayan na pininturahan ng Harold, zimblem at makasaysayang simbolismo. Napakasarap ng pakiramdam ko.
Mainit ang pagkain.  Isang perpektong dami ng sarsa lamang. Hindi basang-basa at hindi masyadong nagpasya na magpatuloy. Figure, oh God was at disappointment, salty salty salty and I found this the perfect time to address the staff like the woman before me.  ginawa ko. Ang sagot ng ginang ay, oh no, well, hindi naman maalat. Yung seasoning lang yung nilagay nila kasi sabi mo walang kaluluwa. Oo, pero pare, maalat, nakikinig ka bang staff was combative argumentative and decided to say okay, might have been just one wing and I taste it But no once I gain composer shut down, finish 2 to 3 wings with some fries fries by the way, paddle salt, pero ang lakas ng loob nitong taong ito na sabihin sa akin na wala pang maalat na saksi, and there is before me salty.  sabi ko wow. Ito ay dapat na nasa ilalim ng bagong pagmamay-ari. So I granted an eyebrow and I just enjoyed the sauce. Ngunit maalat maalat ang salitang to. Araw hindi sa pagbabalik sa loob ng susunod na buwan o higit pa sa parehong resulta asin. Muli, binanggit ko ito sa mga tauhan. Minsan pa naman oh.  Dapat kapag nang-aagaw sila sa manok. Kahit anong palusot ayusin mo. Sinasabi ko sa aking sarili, kaya ipakita ang tungkol sa isang buwan o 2 mamaya ay bumalik. Parehong resulta maalat kaya alinman. Hindi ko alam kung bagong management. New workers new recipe or just plain sabotage ang iniisip ko.  But go and try it and enjoy your salty chicken with the family of flies that I'm sure andiyan tayo. Well, sa susunod kong pagbisita.

Umorder ako ng malaking gizzard at marumi sila. Ibig kong sabihin, alam mo ang ilalim ng gizzard na ang piraso na hinugot mo ito ay nasa aking pritong gizzard. Hindi nila ito inalis. Halos hindi mo rin ito ma-nguya dahil napakatigas nito. Umorder din ako ng white half at binigyan nila ako ng dark half. Isa pa lang ang tao sa loob nung umorder ako ng pagkain ko.. So itâ€™s not like they were busy.

Una ay hindi ako mahilig magbigay ng masamang pagsusuri ngunit dapat kong malaman na may mali sa pag-order online at handa na ito sa loob ng 10-15 minuto. Partikular kong sinabi na huwag magprito nang husto, lemon pepper at mild sauce. wala!

Nag-order ako ng dalawang dagdag na bahagi ng mild sauce, nagbigay ng tip, hindi ito bagong luto na in-order, masasabi mong refried ito o luma na ito at nakaupo na, kahit gaano kataas ang pagkain, bakit gagawin ng mga tao ang mga bagay na ganito sa utos ng mga tao, kaya hindi magandang serbisyo sa customer at sigurado ako kung nasa kabilang paa ang sapatos ay ganoon din ang mararamdaman nila.

Naiintindihan ko na maaaring mangyari ang mga pagkakamali ngunit sa kapinsalaan ng kung gaano kataas ang pagkain at kalusugan ng isang customer, hindi ito tama o propesyonal.

Nakaramdam ako ng sakit sa aking tiyan at sa pera na aking ginastos.

Kailangan itong pag-usapan at agad na gawin ang mga pagbabago.

Umorder ako ng 7 wings with hot and mild sauce. Ang pagkain ay kakila-kilabot. Ang pinakamasama na naranasan ko doon. Iâ€™ve HONESTLY had 2 day leftover chicken na pinainit ko na mas maganda.
Walang dahilan para sa isang order na inilagay ko at hinintay ng 12:30pm sa peak lunch time.

locations.name: Haroldâ€™s Chicken
locations.address: 1711 E 87th St, Chicago, IL 60617, USA
reviews: 1st time here.  My daughter wanted Harold's before she went back to College so I stopped.  They had a good wing special also.  Harold's taste will never be the same as 20 plus years ago but it was ok. Charging extra for sauce is a bit much when it use to come with slaw, fries and sauce- even bread.  Actually paid for the bag and service smh

I came in yesterday on a Friday night, my first-time & requested a half dark chicken with lemon pepper & 2 cans of soda which I ordered separately. I offered my condolences regarding the 55 year old female owner passing...the older female cashier working responded that she didn't know in a nonchalant manner & not a thank U on behalf of the company. I'm like wow... When I got my food 15 mins. later my food was salty with lemon pepper & it didn't even taste like Harold's Chicken either.

The chicken is fresh. I met the owner while I was there, and he was nice and professional.  He takes pride in his restaurant being clean and chicken fresh. It is in a somewhat sketchy neighborhood. However,  it's worth the trip.
I ordered a large gizzard and was extremely disappointed! The gizzards were awful! They had absolutely no taste, very small and hard, no seasoning! Harolds use to have a distinctive taste not these!

I ordered a 10 piece with lots of  sauce. They asked me if I wanted lemon pepper I said yes please. I pulled off and I opened up my bag and I saw that there was just a tiny squeeze of sauce on my chicken. Thatâ€™s the whole reason of going to Haroldâ€™s is to get the sauce and there was absolutely no lemon pepper. Why even ask if youâ€™re not going to put it on there highly disappointed, highly dissatisfied want my money back. Place looks very random down and terrible and the inside

Unang beses ko rito. Gusto ng anak ko ang Harold's bago siya bumalik sa kolehiyo kaya tumigil na ako. Masarap din ang wing special nila. Hindi na magiging katulad ng mahigit 20 taon na ang nakalipas ang lasa ng Harold's pero ayos lang naman. Medyo mahal ang dagdag na singil para sa sarsa dahil dati ay may kasama itong slaw, fries, at sarsa - pati tinapay. Sa totoo lang, binayaran ko ang bag at ang serbisyo.

Pumunta ako kahapon ng Biyernes ng gabi, ang unang beses ko rito at humiling ako ng kalahating dark chicken na may lemon pepper at dalawang lata ng soda na inorder ko nang hiwalay. Nakiramay ako sa pagpanaw ng 55 taong gulang na babaeng may-ari... Sumagot ang matandang babaeng cashier na hindi niya alam sa paraang walang pakialam at hindi nagpasalamat sa ngalan ng kumpanya. Namangha ako... Pagkalipas ng 15 minuto, pagkatanggap ko ng pagkain, maalat na may lemon pepper ang pagkain ko at hindi rin ito lasang Harold's Chicken.

Sariwa ang manok. Nakilala ko ang may-ari habang nandoon ako, at siya ay mabait at propesyonal.  Ipinagmamalaki niya ang kanyang restaurant na malinis at sariwang manok. Ito ay nasa isang medyo malabo na kapitbahayan. Gayunpaman, sulit ang paglalakbay.
Umorder ako ng malaking baul at labis akong nadismaya! Ang pangit ng mga baul! Wala silang lasa, napakaliit at matigas, walang pampalasa! Dati, kakaiba ang lasa ng Harolds, hindi ang mga ito!

Umorder ako ng 10 piece na maraming sauce. Tinanong nila ako kung gusto ko ng lemon pepper I said yes please. I pulled off and I opened up my bag and I saw that there was just a little squeeze of sauce on my chicken. Iyon ang buong dahilan ng pagpunta sa Harold's ay upang makakuha ng sarsa at talagang walang lemon pepper. Bakit mo pa tatanungin kung hindi mo ito ilalagay doon na sobrang bigo, hindi nasisiyahan, gusto kong ibalik ang pera ko. Lugar mukhang napaka-random down at kakila-kilabot at ang loob

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack #13
locations.address: 7318 S Vincennes Ave, Chicago, IL 60621, USA
reviews: Was craving some Yard Bird. On point Delish! Phoned in my order ahead of time and it was hot and ready when I arrived. Haroldâ€™s Chicken hasnâ€™t changed, the white bread under your fries and chicken above, just love how the bread soaks up all that goodness. 5 pc Mild wings with fries and a pc of bread only $11. B Wild wings and Wing-stop AINâ€™T got nothing ON Haroldâ€™s! Street parking in front. No frills type of place hence the word SHACK in its name. Thank you Haroldâ€™s #13

Haroldâ€™s Chicken Shack #13 is a must-visit for classic Chicago fried chicken! I tried their hot wings and they were perfectly crispy, juicy, and packed with flavor. The sides, especially the mac and cheese, were creamy and delicious, making the meal even better. The staff were friendly and quick, even during a busy lunch rush. A true neighborhood favorite for anyone craving authentic, hearty fried chicken!

I saw the harolds truck on my way home and i really thought it was the one from 87th street ,but i was informed it was from this location; no problem i will give them a try.  The chicken was all right but the sauce didnt taste like harold's sauce.  i definitely won't be ordering from this truck again.

Purchased a wing and gizzard combo. They lady took my order was very nice ,but the food was terrible im upset because these gizzards was plain and cooked twice . Just look at the picture . If I was tired I would take this back.  I basically paid $12 for 3 wings and fries because I was not eating the gizzards .

I ordered uber eats delivery and it was disgusting. My wings were not fresh and my order was wrong. I had one 5piece wing and a 4piece. Both did not have lemon pepper on them and they also were not fried hard. Will not be ordering from this location at all.

Hindi nagbago ang Harold's Chicken, ang puting tinapay sa ilalim ng fries at manok sa itaas, gustong-gusto ko kung paano sinisipsip ng tinapay ang lahat ng iyon. 5 piraso ng Mild wings na may fries at isang piraso ng tinapay, $11 lang. B. Walang kwenta ang Wild wings at Wing-stop sa Harold's! May paradahan sa kalye sa harap. Parang walang palamuti ang lugar kaya may salitang SHACK sa pangalan nito. Salamat Harold's #13

Ang Harold's Chicken Shack #13 ay isang dapat-bisitahin para sa klasikong Chicago fried chicken! Sinubukan ko ang kanilang mainit na mga pakpak at sila ay ganap na malutong, makatas, at puno ng lasa. Ang mga gilid, lalo na ang mac at keso, ay creamy at masarap, na nagpapasarap sa pagkain. Ang mga staff ay magiliw at mabilis, kahit na sa isang abalang pananghalian. Isang tunay na paborito ng kapitbahayan para sa sinumang nagnanais ng tunay at masaganang pritong manok!

Nakita ko ang trak ng harolds pauwi at inisip ko talaga na ito ang mula sa 87th street, ngunit napag-alaman sa akin na ito ay mula sa lokasyong ito; walang problema susubukan ko sila.  Ayos lang ang manok pero hindi katulad ng sarsa ni harold ang sarsa.  Tiyak na hindi na ako mag-o-order mula sa trak na ito.

Bumili ng wing at gizzard combo. Kinuha ng babae ang aking order ay napakasarap, ngunit ang pagkain ay kahila-hilakbot na im upset dahil ang mga gizzards na ito ay plain at luto ng dalawang beses. Tingnan mo lang ang larawan. Kung pagod na ako ay babawiin ko ito.  Karaniwang nagbayad ako ng $12 para sa 3 pakpak at fries dahil hindi ako kumakain ng mga gizzards.

Nag-order ako ng uber eat delivery at nakakadiri. Hindi sariwa ang mga pakpak ko at mali ang order ko. Mayroon akong isang 5 pirasong pakpak at isang 4 na piraso. Parehong walang lemon pepper sa kanila at hindi rin sila pinirito nang husto. Hindi mag-o-order mula sa lokasyong ito.

locations.name: Harolds Chicken Shack #27
locations.address: 10259 S Halsted St, Chicago, IL 60628, USA
reviews: The lady at the window was rude. I asked her about sauce on my chicken and she said it was on the side. I  asked could they put it on and she said they won't take it back. I checked when I got to the car and saw it wasn't any on the side, either. I had to go back inside to ask for sauce. She then gave me 2 cups of sauce. Nobody should be that dry in customer service. I understand it's Harold's, but still...

I always see debates about which Harolds is the best. This location on 103rd and Halsted has never ever disappointed! Food always hot and fresh. Cashier super friendly and I've never had to wait an unusual amount of time.
My ONLY issue is that they do not answer the phone all the time, so you may not be able to call in an order.
This Haroldâ€™s slow as hell Iâ€™ve been waiting 40 minutes on 6 wings and no it wasnâ€™t crowded. They also didnâ€™t take call in orders. Food doesnâ€™t taste fresh either

I will never order from this Harold's location again. Every time, they fail to read the instructions on UBER EATS leaving me food I have to doctor up. It's frustrating because the wings are cooked to perfection, but clearly, somebody there can't read. They don't cook it fresh either; I have to reheat and make the food myself hot despite me living only a few minutes (5-minute drive). They never pick up the phone, so there's no way to resolve the issue. If you want decent food, go in-person and avoid ordering off Uber Eats.
