Masungit ang babae sa bintana. I asked her about sauce on my chicken and she said nasa gilid. Tinanong ko kung pwede ba nila itong isuot at ang sabi niya ay hindi na nila ito babawiin. Tiningnan ko nang makarating ako sa kotse at nakita kong wala din sa gilid. Kailangan kong bumalik sa loob para humingi ng sauce. Pagkatapos ay binigyan niya ako ng 2 tasa ng sarsa. Walang sinuman ang dapat na tuyo sa serbisyo sa customer. Alam kong kay Harold iyon, pero...

Palagi akong nakakakita ng mga debate kung sino si Harolds ang pinakamagaling. Ang lokasyong ito sa 103rd at Halsted ay hindi kailanman nabigo! Ang pagkain ay laging mainit at sariwa. Napakabait ng cashier at hindi ko na kinailangan pang maghintay ng hindi pangkaraniwang tagal ng oras.
Ang LAMANG kong isyu ay hindi nila sinasagot ang telepono sa lahat ng oras, kaya maaaring hindi ka makatawag sa isang order.
This Harold's slow as hell I've been waiting 40 minutes on 6 wings and no it wasn't crowded. Hindi rin sila tumanggap ng mga call in order. Hindi rin sariwa ang lasa ng pagkain

Ito na talaga ang paborito kong Harold's simula nang magsimula akong magmaneho noong 2000. Palagi kong sinasabi sa mga tao na pumunta rito. Kahit anong oras ng araw, HINDI ako binigo nitong Harold's. Sa kasamaang palad ngayon, labis akong nadismaya. Umorder ako ng 6 na pakpak na may mild and hot at ang sarap ng pakpak. Madilim talaga ang mga ito, hindi pa nalutong ang fries, at ibang-iba ang sarsa sa dati kong kinakain (hindi masarap). Naiintindihan ko na maaaring maganda ang pagbabago pero anumang pagbabago ang gagawin nila rito ay isang maling desisyon. Nakakalungkot dahil sa mahal na ng pagkain ngayon, hindi ko na kayang suportahan ang lugar na ito dahil sa hindi magandang karanasang ito. Ikukuwento ko rin sa iba ang karanasan ko ngayon. Pasensya na!

locations.address: 1118 W Wilson Ave, Chicago, IL 60640, USA
reviews: This is a Chicago staple. I got buy 2 get 2 free on Doordash. However, I have dined in before too.

Unfortunately, the experience was very disappointing. The wait time for the food was extremely long â€” far beyond what could be considered reasonable. On top of that, no one from the staff tried to explain the delay or apologize.
It feels like customersâ€™ time simply isnâ€™t valued here. Good service includes attention and respect for guests, and that was clearly missing. After this experience, I have no desire to return.

This place is a total scam. I ordered a buy 1-get-1 chicken sandwich offer from uber eats.  They put a long piece of fried chicken (half of which was paper thin) and placed 4 buns on it. A total of 8 fries. They completely ripped me off. If they're cutting corners on their specials, what other shady stuff are they doing? Don't eat here.

They get away with the high pries because this is the Northside and the people don't know any better. You play more and get less at this location and it don't taste like Harold's for real. I ordered here off Uber Eats. Supposed to be a buy one, get one free catfish nuggets meal. Come to find out they only give you 5 nuggets and combine both orders in one tray. With only 1 order of French fries. Now I never heard of a 5 piece cat fish nugget. It's usually just large or small. The fact that you would charge that price for small pieces is crazy. I suggest people avoid this place and go out south or to the Harold's on West Howard. Better prices and taste like real Harold's.

This Haroldâ€™s food is decent, but the problem I have is that they are flexing a proud black owned badge in the window, but the workers are Caucasian frying the chicken, yes very strange. And sheâ€™s doing a great job, although sheâ€™s working alone as the cashier and also the cook. So please donâ€™t be in a hurry coming here.
Cook is very white not black the reply is a lie, also ordered wings from here 12/22/25 and the wings were not seasoned , I ordered them with out sauce on purpose so I could taste them without distraction, they were unseasoned and tasted like the oil needed to be changed
muy buena comida, un poco viejo el establecimiento pero se come bien.

Ito ay isang pangunahing pagkain sa Chicago. Nakakuha ako ng buy 2 get 2 na libre sa Doordash. Gayunpaman, kumain na rin ako dati.

Sa kasamaang palad, ang karanasan ay lubhang nakakadismaya. Ang oras ng paghihintay para sa pagkain ay napakatagal â€” higit pa sa maituturing na makatwiran. Bukod pa riyan, walang sinuman sa mga kawani ang nagtangkang magpaliwanag ng pagkaantala o humingi ng tawad.
Parang hindi pinahahalagahan ang oras ng mga customer dito. Kasama sa mahusay na serbisyo ang atensyon at respeto sa mga bisita, at malinaw na kulang iyon. Pagkatapos ng karanasang ito, wala na akong pagnanais na bumalik.

Scam talaga ang lugar na ito. Umorder ako ng buy 1-get-1 chicken sandwich na alok mula sa Uber Eats. Naglagay sila ng mahabang piraso ng pritong manok (kalahati nito ay manipis) at nilagyan ng apat na tinapay. Walo ang kabuuang fries. Niloko nila ako. Kung nagtitipid sila sa mga espesyal nila, ano pa ang mga kahina-hinalang ginagawa nila? Huwag kumain dito.

Lumalayo sila sa mga mataas na pari dahil ito ang Northside at hindi na alam ng mga tao. Mas marami kang maglaro at kukulangin sa lokasyong ito at hindi talaga ito lasa tulad ng kay Harold. Nag-order ako dito sa Uber Eats. Dapat ay isang bumili ng isa, kumuha ng isang libreng catfish nuggets meal. Halika upang malaman na bibigyan ka lang nila ng 5 nuggets at pagsamahin ang parehong mga order sa isang tray. Sa 1 order lang ng French fries. Ngayon wala na akong narinig na 5 pirasong cat fish nugget. Ito ay kadalasang malaki o maliit lamang. Nakakabaliw ang katotohanan na sisingilin mo ang presyong iyon para sa maliliit na piraso. Iminumungkahi kong iwasan ng mga tao ang lugar na ito at pumunta sa timog o sa Harold's sa West Howard. Mas magandang presyo at lasa tulad ng totoong Harold's.

Masarap naman ang pagkaing ito ni Harold, pero ang problema ko ay may nakadikit silang itim na badge sa bintana, pero ang mga trabahador ay mga Caucasian na nagpiprito ng manok, oo, kakaiba talaga. At mahusay ang trabaho niya, kahit mag-isa lang siyang nagtatrabaho bilang kahera at kusinero. Kaya huwag kayong magmadaling pumunta rito.
Puti ang kusinero, hindi itim, kasinungalingan ang sagot. Umorder din ako ng mga pakpak mula rito noong 12/22/25 at walang timpla ang mga pakpak. Sinadya kong umorder nang walang sarsa para matikman ko nang walang abala. Walang timpla ang mga ito at parang kailangan palitan ang mantika.

locations.name: Berwyn Harold's Chicken & Bar
locations.address: 6307 W 26th St, Berwyn, IL 60402, USA
reviews: The chicken was fresh and hot, the lemon pepper was delicious and of quality. The customer service was excellent ğŸ‘Œ and the vibe was pleasant. This place is unique and brilliant!

First time coming to a Harolds like this. I traveled 50 miles to get to a harolds as it's been over 5 years since having some. The food was so hot and fresh. The atmosphere was nice came on a Sunday during the football game. Nice crowd. Be patient as the food is made to order expect to wait 20-25 mins. Would come again.

I ordered online and walked over to pickup.  The food was on time, hot, fresh, and delicious.  Maybe they had a rocky start? but I didn't experience any of the problems people have mentioned in other reviews.  Plenty of sauce (I ordered it on-the-side), and not greasy-- even the lone piece of white bread on the bottom of the bucket wasn't.

Will be going back.

Finally stopped in, and I was not disappointed at all! Great customer service, food was fresh and soooo good! We had the wings with mild sauce of course(wings and fries were saucy as they should be and they give you a nice amount of fries) we also had mozzarella sticks and the cheese pull made me know it was real lol. I gotta try the mac and cheese bites. We ordered our food to go and my only regret was not getting a cocktail, so that is in my plans in the future. I think its pretty cool to have an option to eat, sip, watch the game and/or listen to music while you get your car washed. I just love a place with vibes and good food, will def be supporting this establishment again!

Sariwa at maanghang ang manok, masarap at de-kalidad ang lemon pepper. Napakahusay ng customer service ğŸ‘Œ at kaaya-aya ang ambiance. Natatangi at napakaganda ng lugar na ito!

First time makapunta sa isang Harold na ganito. Naglakbay ako ng 50 milya upang makarating sa isang harolds dahil mahigit 5 â€‹â€‹taon na ang nakalipas mula nang magkaroon ako ng ilan. Ang pagkain ay napakainit at sariwa. Ang ganda ng kapaligiran ay dumating noong Linggo sa laro ng football. Ganda ng crowd. Maging matiyaga dahil ang pagkain ay ginawa upang mag-order asahan na maghintay ng 20-25 minuto. Darating ulit.

Nag-order ako online at naglakad papunta sa pickup.  Ang pagkain ay nasa oras, mainit, sariwa, at masarap.  Marahil sila ay nagkaroon ng isang mabato na simula? ngunit hindi ko naranasan ang alinman sa mga problemang binanggit ng mga tao sa ibang mga review.  Maraming sarsa (nag-order ako sa gilid), at hindi mamantika-- kahit na ang nag-iisang piraso ng puting tinapay sa ilalim ng balde ay hindi.

Babalik.

Sa wakas ay tumigil, at hindi ako nabigo sa lahat! Mahusay na serbisyo sa customer, sariwa ang pagkain at napakasarap! We had the wings with mild sauce of course(wings and fries were saucy as they should be and they give you a nice amount of fries) we also had mozzarella sticks and the cheese pull made me know it was real lol. Kailangan kong subukan ang mac at cheese bites. Nag-order na kami ng pagkain namin at ang tanging pinagsisisihan ko ay ang hindi pagkuha ng cocktail, kaya iyon ang nasa plano ko sa hinaharap. Sa tingin ko ay maganda ang magkaroon ng opsyong kumain, humigop, manood ng laro at/o makinig ng musika habang hinuhugasan mo ang iyong sasakyan. I just love a place with vibes and good food, will def be supporting this establishment again!

Una sa lahat, sobrang disappointed sa pagkain ng manok ay tama ang mild sauce na inilagay nila sa chicken that's not real Harolds chicken mild sauce Overall service was good the place itself. Napakaganda nito ngunit kailangan nilang magtrabaho sa pagkain. Kunin ito bilang tunay na maaari mong maging sanhi sa ngayon ang recipe ay hindi ito.

Napakasarap nito at kailangan mong ilagay ang banayad na sarsa para makuha ang banayad na sarsa. I'm so sorry wala akong mga litrato. Ito ay tulad ng sandaling nakuha ko ang manok at sumakay sa kotse. Literal na langhap ko ito habang nagmamaneho ako pabalik sa hotel room ko, so Harold do yâ€™all thing.

Ito na ang pinakamasarap na Harolds na natikman ko.
Hindi lasang Harolds ang manok, parang niluto ko ito sa bahay. Napakalaki at tuyo ng dibdib.
Iba talaga ang banayad na sarsa ng fries kumpara sa banayad na sarsa na ibinigay sa akin sa gilid. Sana ma-upload ko pa ang order na sinayang ko at nasayang ko. Hindi na ako gagamit ulit ng Uber eats. Hindi nito sasabihin ang address ng Harolds BC. Hindi sana ako nag-oorder sa tindahang iyon. Siguro kaya wala silang nakakabit na numero ng kanilang tindahan.
Mag-ingat!!!!!!

Minsan, ang lokasyon ay nagiging hindi kaaya-aya sa kapaligiran. Ang mga serbisyo ay wala silang pakialam kung gaano katagal ka nakaupo doon. Hindi nila palaging inihahain ang pagkain, unang dumating, unang magsisilbi. At ang pinaka-alam nila ay kung ano ang hindi nila inilalagay sa iyong bag. Ito ay ang coleslaw. Ang Harold's Chicken ay palaging may masarap na coleslaw. Alam kong maraming tao ang hindi kumakain ng coleslaw dahil napakaraming lugar na hindi alam kung paano ito lutuin.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Avondale
locations.address: 3517 N Spaulding Ave, Chicago, IL 60618, USA
reviews: Haroldâ€™s Chicken Avondale is the perfect spot for chicken wings. Arguably the best chicken restaurant in Picnic Digital Food Court. We order the 8 Piece Wings, Large Fries, and Mild sauce. The chicken was cooked up quickly and was both crispy and flavorful! We will be back for more soon!

I genuinely tried to give the new Haroldâ€™s in Avondale a fair chance. Iâ€™ve been eating Haroldâ€™s from different locations across Chicago for over 20 years, so I know the classic Haroldâ€™s flavor, texture, and quality. Even after seeing the string of 1-star reviews, we still placed an orderâ€”mainly because the Haroldâ€™s on Milwaukee & Wood wasnâ€™t taking orders that day.
We ordered from UberEats two 6-piece wings with black pepper on everything, plus mild and hot sauce on the side, using the Buy 1 Get 1 Free promotion. Somehow, all four trays were disappointing. The chicken was dark, bitter, and tasted like it had been fried in old grease. The crust was extremely hardâ€”more like it had been cooked earlier, left sitting around, and then dropped back in the fryer. Nothing about it tasted fresh, or even close to the Haroldâ€™s standard Iâ€™ve known for two decades.

What really made me shake my head is that most Haroldâ€™s locations proudly display the famous sign: â€œAll orders cooked fresh to order â€” 20 minutes or more.â€ Itâ€™s practically a Haroldâ€™s cultural landmark at this point. But this location must have reinvented the slogan, because nothing in our order tasted â€œfresh to order.â€ If anything, it tasted more like â€œsat for 20 minutes or moreâ€ before being reheated.

I took photos because the difference between this batch and what real Haroldâ€™s should look like is night and day. As someone who has eaten Haroldâ€™s consistently for 20+ years, this was one of the most disappointing Haroldâ€™s experiences Iâ€™ve ever had. I really hope the quality improves, because Avondale deserves better than four trays of overcooked, stale-tasting wings.

Located in a digital food court, but very easy to order and pick-up. The chicken and fish were both FRESH and Flavorful.

One of the best in terms of taste and convenience in the area.

Ang Harold's Chicken Avondale ay ang perpektong lugar para sa mga pakpak ng manok. Masasabing ang pinakamahusay na restaurant ng manok sa Picnic Digital Food Court. Umorder kami ng 8 Piece Wings, Large Fries, at Mild sauce. Mabilis na naluto ang manok at parehong malutong at masarap! Babalik kami sa lalong madaling panahon!

Talagang sinubukan kong bigyan ng patas na pagkakataon ang bagong Harold sa Avondale. Mahigit 20 taon na akong kumakain ng Harold's mula sa iba't ibang lokasyon sa buong Chicago, kaya alam ko ang lasa, texture, at kalidad ng classic na Harold. Kahit na nakita na namin ang string ng mga 1-star na review, nag-order pa rin kamiâ€”pangunahin dahil hindi kumukuha ng order ang Harold's sa Milwaukee & Wood noong araw na iyon.
Nag-order kami mula sa UberEats ng dalawang 6-piece wings na may black pepper sa lahat, kasama ang banayad at mainit na sarsa sa gilid, gamit ang Buy 1 Get 1 Free promotion. Kahit papaano, nakakadismaya ang apat na tray. Ang manok ay maitim, mapait, at lasa na parang pinirito sa lumang mantika. Ang crust ay napakatigasâ€”na parang niluto kanina, iniwan na nakaupo, at pagkatapos ay ibinalik sa fryer. Wala tungkol dito ang sariwa, o kahit na malapit sa pamantayan ng Harold na kilala ko sa loob ng dalawang dekada.

Ang talagang nagpa-iling sa akin ay ang karamihan sa mga lokasyon ni Harold ay buong pagmamalaki na nagpapakita ng sikat na karatula: "Lahat ng mga order na niluto bago mag-order - 20 minuto o higit pa." Ito ay halos isang cultural landmark ni Harold sa puntong ito. Ngunit ang lokasyong ito ay dapat na muling nag-imbento ng slogan, dahil wala sa aming order ang nakatikim ng "fresh to order." Kung mayroon man, mas malasa itong "umupo ng 20 minuto o higit pa" bago pinainit.

Kumuha ako ng mga larawan dahil ang pagkakaiba sa pagitan ng batch na ito at kung ano ang dapat na hitsura ni Harold ay gabi at araw. Bilang isang taong patuloy na kumakain ng Harold's sa loob ng 20+ na taon, ito ang isa sa mga pinaka nakakadismaya na karanasan ni Harold na naranasan ko. Talagang inaasahan kong bumuti ang kalidad, dahil ang Avondale ay karapat-dapat na mas mahusay kaysa sa apat na tray ng sobrang luto, lipas na mga pakpak.

Matatagpuan sa isang digital food court, ngunit napakadaling i-order at kunin. Parehong FRESH at Flavorful ang manok at isda.

Isa sa mga pinakamahusay sa mga tuntunin ng panlasa at kaginhawahan sa lugar.

Sinubukan ko ang kanilang mga pakpak at hito sa dalawang magkahiwalay na okasyon at parehong may malalaking sukat ng bahagi at sinusunod ang orihinal na recipe upang pigilan ang pananabik ng Harold.

Umorder lang ako ng pagkain at humingi ng sarsa sa gilid.. sa halip ay hindi nila pinansin ang kahilingan ko at ang sarsa. Ito ang unang beses na natikman ko ang Harold's Chicken at hindi ko nagustuhan ang sinasabing pinakamasarap na bahagi.. ang sarsa. Masarap ang manok pero sobrang nadismaya. Pakitingnan ang iyong order kung umorder ka rito.
Ang mga malambot at fries ay sariwa at perpektong napapanahong OMG. Hindi rin sila madamot sa sauce! 100000/10, salamat sa pagdala ng magandang manok sa north side!

locations.name: Harold's chicken Oaklawn
locations.address: 4709 W 95th St, Oak Lawn, IL 60453, USA
reviews:
The first time I bought from here, shortly after they opened the Food was seasoned well, not stingy with the sauce. Service very friendly and efficient. Wings were a bit pricey 6 wings for $14. Gizzards reasonably priced. My number one go to!

Ffwd to almost two months later to today, I ordered the same thing. But they didn't put any lemon pepper as requested and was STINGY with the sauce. Very disappointing for the price and because it was early and not busy when I placed my order. I won't be back and I do not recommend this location--what a shame!

The food is always so fresh and hot!  I appreciate this location because other locations are notorious for refrying the chicken, using old fries, etc.  I have had chicken, fish and shrimp from here and they do NOT disappoint!  The lunch special is UNMATCHED!!  The staff are always friendly and welcoming!  I am thankful for this new locationâ€¦we have needed one west of Pulaski!!
I requested extra mild sauce and lemon pepper and was served this. They have Indian cooks who donâ€™t season the food everything was bland including the catfish I got.  Waited over 30 minutes

I was the 3rd person to order food it was only 3 customers in there im just now getting my food and leaving from 240pm til now. 330pm My food wasnâ€™t even fixed the way I asked 12pc wing bucket fried hard with lemon pepper family coleslaw and fries. Food wasnâ€™t hard, no lemon pepper, gave me a small coleslaw, and somewhat warm family fries. I finally gets home get ready to eat I put 6 wings on a plate went to put the other wings on a plate and itâ€™s only 5 wings so now Iâ€™m missing 1 wing. For it to have been my 1st time there, I will not be going back I will not be missing this location at all and the only reason it has any stars from me is because it wouldnâ€™t let me post without putting the 1 star for each one

By way of Texas! Stop by before going to Midway Airport and selected a 4 wing meal. The wings were freshly fried to order. This meal slabbed my taste buds with a delicious favor. The mild sauce was a first for me and in my opinion it complimented the chicken perfectly. I highly recommend.
Excelente servicio comida deliciosa las wings que delicia y con la salsita dulce
Las uvas son los mejor las alitas y los camarones son mis favoritos

The first time I buy from here, maya maya lang nabuksan nila ang Food ay tinimplahan ng husto, hindi maramot sa sauce. Ang serbisyo ay napaka-friendly at mahusay. Ang mga pakpak ay medyo mahal 6 na pakpak para sa $14. Makatuwirang presyo ang mga gizzards. Ang aking numero uno pumunta sa!

Ffwd to almost two months later to today, ganun din ang inorder ko. Pero wala silang nilagay na lemon pepper as requested at KAROT sa sauce. Very disappointing for the price at dahil maaga pa at hindi busy nung nag-order ako. Hindi na ako babalik at hindi ko inirerekomenda ang lokasyong ito--nakakahiya!

Laging sariwa at mainit ang pagkain!  Pinahahalagahan ko ang lokasyong ito dahil ang ibang mga lokasyon ay kilalang-kilala sa pagre-reprito ng manok, paggamit ng mga lumang fries, atbp. Mayroon akong manok, isda at hipon mula dito at HINDI sila nabigo!  UNMATCHED ang lunch special!!  Palaging palakaibigan at magiliw ang mga staff!  Nagpapasalamat ako sa bagong lokasyong ito...kinailangan namin ang isa sa kanluran ng Pulaski!!

Humingi ako ng extra mild sauce at lemon pepper at ito ang inihain sa akin. May mga Indian cook sila na hindi nagtimpla ng pagkain, lahat ay walang lasa, pati na ang hito na binili ko. Naghintay ako ng mahigit 30 minuto.

Ako ang pangatlong umorder ng pagkain, tatlong customer lang ang naroon. Ngayon lang ako kumuha ng pagkain ko at aalis na mula 2:40 PM hanggang ngayon. 3:30 PM. Hindi pa nga naayos ang pagkain ko gaya ng hiniling ko. 12 piraso ng wing bucket na prito na may lemon pepper at fries. Hindi matigas ang pagkain, walang lemon pepper, binigyan ako ng maliit na coleslaw, at medyo mainit na family fries. Sa wakas ay nakauwi na ako at naghanda na para kumain. Naglagay ako ng 6 na wings sa plato at inilagay ko ang iba pang wings sa plato at 5 wings lang naman ito kaya ngayon, isang wing na lang ang kulang. Dahil ito ang unang beses ko roon, hindi na ako babalik. Hindi ko talaga mami-miss ang lugar na ito at ang tanging dahilan kung bakit may mga bituin ito mula sa akin ay dahil hindi nila ako pinapayagang mag-post nang hindi naglalagay ng 1 bituin para sa bawat isa.

Daan sa Texas! Dumaan muna kayo bago pumunta sa Midway Airport at pumili ng 4 wing meal. Ang mga pakpak ay bagong prito ayon sa order. Ang pagkaing ito ay pumukaw sa aking panlasa. Ang banayad na sarsa ang una kong naranasan at sa aking palagay ay bumagay ito sa manok. Lubos kong inirerekomenda.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 8738 S Kedzie Ave, Evergreen Park, IL 60805, USA
reviews:
Cashier has bad attitudes and I waited 45mins for my order rib tips and after asking about why it took a long time "fheir putting the sauce on it and that took 10mins.
While I was standing at the counter watching and waiting I couldn't help but see the" Bottle of Patron" being distributed.  SERVICE TERRIBLE !!!
The rib tips okay sauce greasy

This is a sleeper Harolds. Not too many people realize how good this location is which is great because not as crowded as some of the other Harolds. When you tell them fried hard they fry your chicken hard. Would give them 5 stars but they still only doing cash payments which is old school but the food here is great.

This restaurant by the edible arrangement by 87th & Kedzie was horrible. My family is sick because the worker didn't "feel" like taking our order so the chicken was half done and the sauce was not portioned right on the ENTIRE MEAL. I don't usually leave these reviews but if you don't like your job find a new one. This is a business. Leave your "feelings" at the door or go to therapy. One of the WORST $55 I spent. I do not recommend going here at all. In stead of opening more franchises let's train on customer service and company value. Have a good one. Oh and I want a refund as well!

Every time we stop by at the Dunkin donuts next door we're always saying we're going to try this place. We ordered a 8 piece mixed with lemon pepper and hot sauce on the side. We waited about 30 minutes for the food which for me I think it's excessive for an 8 piece. Chicken was descent enough for me to want to order again but next time I will order ahead of time.

Masama ang ugali ng cashier at naghintay ako ng 45mins para sa aking order rib tips at pagkatapos magtanong kung bakit ang tagal "fheir put the sauce on it and that took 10mins.
Habang nakatayo ako sa counter nanonood at naghihintay ay hindi ko maiwasang makita ang "Bote ng Patron" na ipinamimigay.  SERBISYO NAKAKAKIKIT!!!
Ang rib tips okay sauce mamantika

Natutulog itong si Harolds. Hindi masyadong maraming tao ang nakakaalam kung gaano kaganda ang lokasyong ito na napakaganda dahil hindi kasing sikip ng ilan sa iba pang Harolds. Kapag sinabi mong pinirito nang husto ay piniprito nila ng husto ang manok mo. Would give them 5 stars but they still doing only cash payments which is old school pero ang sarap ng pagkain dito.

Ang restaurant na ito sa pamamagitan ng edible arrangement ni 87th & Kedzie ay kakila-kilabot. Ang aking pamilya ay may sakit dahil ang manggagawa ay hindi "naramdaman" na kunin ang aming order kaya ang manok ay kalahating tapos at ang sauce ay hindi nahati sa BUONG PAGKAIN. Hindi ko karaniwang iniiwan ang mga review na ito ngunit kung hindi mo gusto ang iyong trabaho maghanap ng bago. Ito ay isang negosyo. Iwanan ang iyong "mga damdamin" sa pintuan o pumunta sa therapy. Isa sa PINAKAMAHUSAY na $55 na ginastos ko. Hindi ko inirerekumenda ang pagpunta dito. Sa halip na magbukas ng mas maraming prangkisa, sanayin natin ang serbisyo sa customer at halaga ng kumpanya. Magkaroon ng magandang isa. Oh at gusto ko rin ng refund!

Tuwing dumaan kami sa Dunkin donuts sa tabi namin lagi naming sinasabi na susubukan namin ang lugar na ito. Umorder kami ng 8 piraso na may halong lemon pepper at mainit na sarsa sa gilid. We waited about 30 minutes for the food which for me I think it's excessive for an 8 piece. Chicken was descent enough para gusto kong umorder ulit pero next time mauuna na ako.

Ang pagkain ay palaging napakasarap at sariwa!!! Ang kusinero ay nararapat na yakapin !!! Masasabi mong naglalaan siya ng oras sa pagluluto ng pagkain at ito ay eksakto kung paano mo ito hinihingi â€¦.. Ang mga cashier ay palaging napakaganda. At propesyonal. BEST isa hands down!!!!

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 4527 Lincoln Hwy, Matteson, IL 60443, USA
reviews:
Came in at 8pm on Saturday it was not busy employees were very nice, but they had a fryer full of chicken and a fryer of fries. With it being not busy was unsure of how fresh the food would be ordered a fresh order cook was nice and didnâ€™t have a problem. But he did not change his gloves when starting the order, that was a turn off.
Restraint looks clean on inside customer side but needs to be deep cleaned and repainted in the cooking area another big turn off. So I just canceled my order and went to the one on Cicero and 163rd

The call in order took an additional 20 minutes waiting time after paying for your food while other call in orders that was paid after me walked in and walked rite out with their food. Plus they didn't put any of the sauces in the bag and the lady waitress walked around as if it wasn't any customers at the counter never said hello to nobody just rude.

I went in here being very nice.  Iâ€™m very particular about my food i watched them doing wrong when they put sauce all over my food when I asked for it on the side.  I let that slide still being nice I asked the girl taking my order at the time if she can give me a pop because they were doing wrong she said no, we donâ€™t give nothing free.  When I get get home itâ€™s lemon pepper all over my food in which I didnâ€™t ask for.  I called the manager and he was very dismissive even thru my niceness he had no answers and hung up on me.  Again I was respectful and nice the whole time.
I purchased 6 wings fried hard with mild sauce, salt n pepper. The wings were old with feathers still on them. Didn't taste like the Harolds I'm used to. Not fresh or good at all. See photo.

I ordered a 6 wing, well done, mild sauce & lemon pepper.. I received a sprinkle of sauce , fries white -free of sauce & no lemon pepper.. This alone will stop anyone from ordering.  I paid $15 for a 6 wing. Only thing good here is the daily specials & location.

Pumasok ng 8pm noong Sabado hindi ito abala ang mga empleyado ay napakabuti, ngunit mayroon silang isang fryer na puno ng manok at isang fryer ng fries. Dahil sa pagiging hindi abala ay hindi sigurado kung gaano kasariwa ang pag-uutos ng pagkain sa isang sariwang order na lutuin ay masarap at walang problema. Ngunit hindi niya binago ang kanyang guwantes nang simulan ang order, iyon ay isang turn off.
Mukhang malinis ang restraint sa loob ng customer ngunit kailangang linisin nang malalim at muling ipinta sa lugar ng pagluluto sa isa pang malaking turn off. Kaya kinansela ko na lang ang order ko at pumunta sa sa Cicero at 163rd

Ang tawag ay inabot ng karagdagang 20 minutong paghihintay pagkatapos magbayad para sa iyong pagkain habang ang ibang mga tawag ay nabayaran na pagkatapos kong pumasok at lumabas na dala ang kanilang pagkain. Isa pa, hindi nila inilagay ang kahit anong sarsa sa supot at ang babaeng waitress ay naglalakad na parang walang customer sa counter, hindi kailanman bumati kahit kanino, bastos lang.

Pumasok ako dito na napakabait.  I'm very particular about my food I watched them doing wrong when they put sauce all over my food when I asked for it on the side.  I let that slide still being nice I asked the girl taking my order at the time if she can give me a pop because they are doing wrong she said no, we donâ€™t give nothing free.  Pag-uwi ko, lemon pepper ang laman ng pagkain ko na hindi ko hiningi.  I called the manager and he was very dismissive even thru my niceness wala siyang sagot at binabaan ako.  Muli ako ay magalang at mabait sa buong panahon.

Bumili ako ng 6 na pakpak na prito at may banayad na sarsa, asin at paminta. Luma na ang mga pakpak at may mga balahibo pa. Hindi ito katulad ng nakasanayan kong lasa ng Harolds. Hindi sariwa o masarap. Tingnan ang larawan.

Nag-order ako ng 6 wing, well done, mild sauce & lemon pepper.. Nakatanggap ako ng sprinkle of sauce , fries white -free of sauce & no lemon pepper.. This alone will stop anyone from order.  Nagbayad ako ng $15 para sa isang 6 na pakpak. Ang maganda lang dito ay ang pang-araw-araw na espesyal at lokasyon.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack #36 (Wicker Park)
locations.address: 1361 N Milwaukee Ave, Chicago, IL 60622, USA
reviews:
While visiting Chicago I was able to visit Haroldâ€™s Chicken #36. I ordered it the â€œChicago wayâ€ â€” salt, pepper, mild sauce. It was fresh out the fryer, which already earned it points before the first bite. I was the very first customer so the order took some time which they warned me of when I placed my order.

The chicken itself was the highlight. Super crispy on the outside â€” Juicy and cooked perfectly. It was fresh and made to order.

Once you got past the outer crisp, the meat itself was a bit plain. Not bad by any means â€” justâ€¦ lacking the flavor I'm use to. I assume this is because the sauce is the overall highlight.

Now letâ€™s talk about that mild sauce. I know itâ€™s a Chicago tradition and a Haroldâ€™s signature, but it didnâ€™t really do it for me. It had a slightly sweet, tomato-forward taste that reminded me a little too much of ketchup that's diluted with vinegar. Not terrible, just not the flavor bomb I was expecting. It kind of coated everything without elevating it. I prefer MUMBO sauce wayyyyyy more.

All in all, Iâ€™m glad I tried it. Itâ€™s part of the culture, and the freshness and texture alone made it worth the stop. But if weâ€™re talking strictly about flavor, it didnâ€™t quite live up to the hype for me.

Final Verdict: Worth the experience, but not a must-have repeat.

Rating: 7.8/10

I THINK this is one of the original Haroldâ€™s of Chicago:   THINK.

Absolutely drop dead traditional made to order only fried chicken.   Priced right, carry it out and always tip your bartenders well.

When you look beyond the exterior and the restaurant itself and just focus on the food  this place is the almost perfect place for fried chicken , the portions in comparison to the price is amazing , the tenders are HUGE and juicy and their bbq is AMAZING. And the fries are also tasty, I would eat from there over and over again. It is good to note it is a TAKE OUT place. Donâ€™t expect to sit in.
I ask for lemon pepper I guess I got it right I mean right what do wild see. This is my first time ever in Chicago tasting this if Iâ€™m wrong let me know

If you just care about going from hungry to full with delicious food at a fair price. This place does just that.

Ordering ahead and picking up to go is probrably the best way to get food here.

Pros: Perfectly fried and seasoned fish and chicken, generous portions. The chicken was juicy and crispy and not too heavy. Usually fried catfish is tough to get right but here it was perfectly balanced with tenderness and juicyness and crispyness.

Cons: Limited dine-in capability, fresh to order meals take at least 20min (was worth the wait).
Si quieres pollo recien preparado, te lo recomiendo, ya sea un pollo completo como solo alitas o las partes que prefieras.

Durante mi visita a Chicago, pude visitar Harold's Chicken #36. Lo pedÃ­ al "estilo Chicago": sal, pimienta y salsa suave. Estaba reciÃ©n salido de la freidora, lo que ya le daba puntos antes del primer bocado. Fui el primer cliente, asÃ­ que el pedido tardÃ³ un poco, algo que me advirtieron al hacer el mÃ­o.

El pollo en sÃ­ era lo mÃ¡s destacado. Supercrujiente por fuera, jugoso y cocinado a la perfecciÃ³n. Era fresco y hecho al momento.

Una vez que pasabas la parte crujiente, la carne en sÃ­ era un poco sosa. No estaba mal, ni mucho menos, solo... le faltaba el sabor al que estoy acostumbrado. Supongo que se debe a que la salsa es lo mÃ¡s destacado.

Ahora hablemos de esa salsa suave. SÃ© que es una tradiciÃ³n de Chicago y un sello distintivo de Harold's, pero no me convenciÃ³. TenÃ­a un sabor ligeramente dulce, con un toque a tomate, que me recordÃ³ demasiado al kÃ©tchup diluido en vinagre. No estaba mal, pero no era la bomba de sabor que esperaba. Como que lo cubriÃ³ todo sin realzarlo. Prefiero muchÃ­simo mÃ¡s la salsa MUMBO.

En resumen, me alegro de haberla probado. Es parte de la cultura, y la frescura y la textura por sÃ­ solas hicieron que valiera la pena. Pero si hablamos estrictamente del sabor, no estuvo a la altura de las expectativas.

Veredicto final: Vale la pena la experiencia, pero no es para repetir.

Creo que este es uno de los Harold's originales de Chicago: Â¡PiÃ©nsenlo!

Un pollo frito tradicional, hecho al momento, Â¡de risa! Tiene un precio justo, puedes pedirlo para llevar y siempre da buenas propinas a los camareros.

Habang bumibisita sa Chicago, napuntahan ko ang Haroldâ€™s Chicken #36. Inorder ko ito sa "Chicago way" â€” asin, paminta, at banayad na sarsa. Bagong luto ito mula sa fryer, kaya nakakuha na ito ng puntos bago pa man ang unang subo. Ako ang pinakaunang customer kaya medyo natagalan ang order na binalaan nila ako noong nag-order ako.

Ang manok mismo ang pinakatampok. Super crispy sa labas â€” Makatas at perpektong luto. Sariwa ito at ginawa ayon sa order.

Nang malagpasan mo na ang panlabas na crispy, medyo plain na ang karne mismo. Hindi naman masama â€” kulang langâ€¦ sa lasang nakasanayan ko. Sa palagay ko ito ay dahil ang sarsa ang pangkalahatang highlight.

Ngayon, pag-usapan natin ang banayad na sarsa. Alam kong tradisyon ito ng Chicago at isang Haroldâ€™s signature, pero hindi talaga ito ang gusto ko. Medyo matamis ito, parang kamatis ang lasa na nagpapaalala sa akin ng ketchup na hinaluan ng suka. Hindi naman masama, hindi lang ang flavor bomb na inaasahan ko. Medyo natatakpan nito ang lahat nang hindi ito tumataas. Mas gusto ko ang MUMBO sauce nang sobra.

Sa kabuuan, natutuwa akong nasubukan ko ito. Bahagi na ito ng kultura, at ang kasariwaan at tekstura pa lang ang dahilan kung bakit sulit itong subukan. Pero kung ang pag-uusapan ay puro lasa, hindi ito umabot sa inaasahan ko.

Pangwakas na Hatol: Sulit ang karanasan, pero hindi dapat ulitin.

Rating: 7.8/10

I THINK this is one of the original Harold's of Chicago: THINK.

Absolutely drop dead traditional made to order only fried chicken.   Sakto ang presyo, isagawa ito at laging tip sa iyong mga bartender.

Kung titingnan mo ang labas ng restaurant mismo at magtutuon ka sa pagkain, halos perpekto ang lugar na ito para sa pritong manok. Ang mga serving kumpara sa presyo ay kahanga-hanga, ang mga tenders ay MALALAKI at makatas, at ang kanilang bbq ay KAMANGHA-MANGHA. At masarap din ang fries, paulit-ulit akong kakain doon. Mahalagang tandaan na ito ay isang TAKE OUT place. Huwag umasa na uupo ka lang.
Humingi ako ng lemon pepper I guess I got it right I mean right what do wild see. Ito ang unang pagkakataon ko sa Chicago na matikman ito kung mali ako ipaalam sa akin

Kung nagmamalasakit ka lang sa pagpunta mula sa gutom hanggang sa busog sa masasarap na pagkain sa isang patas na presyo. Iyon lang ang ginagawa ng lugar na ito.

Ang pag-order nang maaga at pag-pick up para pumunta ay marahil ang pinakamahusay na paraan upang makakuha ng pagkain dito.

Mga Pros: Perpektong pinirito at tinimplahan na isda at manok, masaganang bahagi. Ang manok ay makatas at malutong at hindi masyadong mabigat. Karaniwan ang piniritong hito ay mahirap makuha ngunit narito ito ay ganap na balanse sa lambot at makatas at malutong.

Cons: Limitado ang kakayahan sa dine-in, bago mag-order ng mga pagkain ay tumatagal ng hindi bababa sa 20min (ay sulit ang paghihintay).

locations.name: Harold's Chicken On Clinton
locations.address: 115 S Clinton St, Chicago, IL 60661, USA
reviews: Outstanding service.  The Chicken is always piping hot and fresh.  Ordering takes about 15 minutes.  They have also set up cameras so you can see your meal being prepared.  I will never again go to another chicken place in the area.  They also have lunch specials from 10am-4pm, Monday through Saturday.

Natitirang serbisyo.  Ang Manok ay laging mainit at sariwa.  Ang pag-order ay tumatagal ng humigit-kumulang 15 minuto.  Nag-set up din sila ng mga camera para makita mo ang iyong pagkain na inihahanda.  Hindi na ako pupunta sa ibang lugar ng manok sa lugar.  Mayroon din silang mga espesyal na tanghalian mula 10am-4pm, Lunes hanggang Sabado.
SARADO ang lugar na ito... idk kung bakit nakalista pa rin ito sa Google

Pinakamasamang karanasan kailanman. Mahabang paghihintay, walang lasang tuyong manok, medyo naluto nang sobra, walang sawsawan kaya ang kaunting sarsa na nilagyan nila ay iyon na lang, na hindi mo naman nalalasahan, at ayos lang ang mahabang paghihintay hanggang sa tila medyo matagal na rin ang pagkain namin bago namin ito natanggap. Inirekomenda ito mula sa isang dating nakatira sa Chicago pero iyon ang pinakamasamang karanasan sa chicken spot na naranasan ko.
Sarado na. Huwag mong sayangin ang oras mo.
Napakasarap. Umorder ako ng 1/4 na puting hapunan at ang pagkain ay pinirito nang perpekto at malinis ang restawran. Babalik ako pagkatapos ng Kuwaresma.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken of Dyer #19
locations.address: 101 Joliet St, Dyer, IN 46311, USA
reviews: I ordered salt & pepper on catfish fillets. The fact that an entire bottle of pepper was dumped on the fish is RIDICULOUS! Young teens in the restaurant playing instead of being professional. I donâ€™t live down the streets so getting all the way home to see this mess was upsetting to say the least. Family waiting for Sunday dinner and this is what they got on too of the food not being ready even after waiting an additional 20min so over an hour wait in total. Waste of $33.19.

Tonight on my way to work I ordered a 6 piece. I pick up order and everything seemed fine. I get to work which was a short ride from the restaurant and my food was horrible. I asked for crispy which it was not and you could tell it also wasnâ€™t fresh. I asked for lemon pepper on the wings and nothing. Plus the wings had feathers all on them. The only thing worth eating was the fries. This place has really went down and I use to order from them all the time for personal and for my work events. I think itâ€™s time I stopped spending my money here. A total waste of money.
Just went today!..I must say I was impressed 8/10. The one on Grant is the best in the Midwest hands down, but now that im closer this works!

When in the area we always order chicken from this location. The last time was about a year ago and from I remember the food was hot, fresh and delicious! This was NOT the case today! I took my kids to the jumpy place down the street, placed my order and we walked down to eat! When we walked in, the store smelled of really strong chemical/cleaning spray! The tables and floors were not cleaned and trash was on the floor. We ordered chicken tenders and fries for the kids and 6 piece fried hard, lemon pepper w/ extra sauce and fried green tomatoes. Everything was just wrong and not what we expected for $40. The fried green tomatoes were extremely thin and couldnâ€™t see nor taste the tomato ( Iâ€™m not sure if it was an actual tomato in there) the breading was fried HARD!!! Our chicken wings were huge, not fried hard and barely any sauce, that we paid extra for. Now to my kids chicken tenders, they had a weird color to the breading almost as if it was really old oil maybe. We asked for ketchup for their tenders, THEY CHARGED FOR THE KETCHUP!!!!!! You mean to tell me, we paid $40 for all this food and we can get ketchup packets? I just canâ€™t get over this. I say all this to say, just pass by and go to another location! This food and service was terrible and disappointing! I really hate spending money on food and Itâ€™s not satisfying!

This is the real deal all of them are not the same this world is turned upside down but this is definitely Harold's Chicken for real for real the sauce is so old school I am 66 years old I've been around I know the difference this is a must go to

Nag-order ako ng asin at paminta sa mga fillet ng hito. Ang katotohanan na ang isang buong bote ng paminta ay itinapon sa isda ay katawa-tawa! Naglalaro ang mga kabataan sa restaurant sa halip na maging propesyonal. Hindi ako nakatira sa mga kalye kaya ang pag-uwi para makita ang gulo na ito ay nakakainis. Naghihintay ang pamilya para sa hapunan sa Linggo at ito ang kanilang nakuha sa pagkain na hindi handa kahit na naghintay ng karagdagang 20min kaya mahigit isang oras na paghihintay sa kabuuan. Pag-aaksaya ng $33.19.

Tonight on my way to work nag-order ako ng 6 piece. Kinuha ko ang order at tila maayos ang lahat. Pumasok ako sa trabaho na isang maikling biyahe mula sa restaurant at ang aking pagkain ay kakila-kilabot. Humingi ako ng malutong na hindi naman at masasabi mong hindi rin ito sariwa. Humingi ako ng lemon pepper sa pakpak at wala. At ang mga pakpak ay may mga balahibo lahat sa kanila. Ang tanging bagay na dapat kainin ay ang fries. Ang lugar na ito ay talagang bumaba at palagi akong nag-o-order sa kanila para sa personal at para sa aking mga kaganapan sa trabaho. Sa palagay ko ay oras na upang ihinto ko ang paggastos ng aking pera dito. Isang kabuuang pag-aaksaya ng pera.
Pumunta lang ngayon!..Masasabi kong humanga ako ng 8/10. Yung sa Grant ang pinakamaganda sa Midwest, pero ngayong malapit na ako, gumana na!

Kapag nasa lugar ay palagi kaming nag-o-order ng manok sa lokasyong ito. The last time was about a year ago and from I remember ang pagkain ay mainit, sariwa at masarap! HINDI ito ang kaso ngayon! Dinala ko ang aking mga anak sa nakakatuwang lugar sa kalye, inilagay ang aking order at bumaba kami para kumain! Pagpasok namin, amoy talaga ng malakas na chemical/cleaning spray ang tindahan! Ang mga mesa at sahig ay hindi nalinis at ang mga basura ay nasa sahig. Nag-order kami ng chicken tenders and fries para sa mga bata at 6 piece fried hard, lemon pepper w/ extra sauce at fried green tomatoes. Mali lang ang lahat at hindi ang inaasahan namin sa halagang $40. Ang piniritong berdeng kamatis ay lubhang manipis at hindi makita o matitikman ang kamatis (hindi ako sigurado kung ito ay isang aktwal na kamatis doon) ang breading ay pinirito nang MAHIRAP!!! Ang aming mga pakpak ng manok ay napakalaki, hindi pinirito nang husto at halos walang sauce, na binayaran namin ng dagdag. Now to my kids chicken tenders, they had a weird color to the breading almost as if it was really old oil siguro. Humingi kami ng ketchup para sa tenders nila, SININGIL NILA ANG KETCHUP!!!!!! Ibig mong sabihin sa akin, nagbayad kami ng $40 para sa lahat ng pagkain na ito at makakakuha tayo ng mga pakete ng ketchup? Hindi lang ako makaget over dito. Sinasabi ko ang lahat ng ito upang sabihin, dumaan lamang at pumunta sa ibang lokasyon! Ang pagkain at serbisyong ito ay kakila-kilabot at nakakadismaya! Ayaw ko talagang gumastos ng pera sa pagkain at Hindi ito kasiya-siya!

Ito ang totoo, hindi silang lahat pareho, nabaliktad ang mundong ito, pero ito talaga ang Harold's Chicken, talagang, totoong-totoo, ang old school ng sarsa. 66 taong gulang na ako. Alam ko na ang pagkakaiba, dapat mong puntahan ito.

Natutuwa akong nagbukas ang lokasyong itoâ€”nakakatuwa na medyo malapit lang sila! Bagama't maaaring mas matagal ang paghihintay para sa pagkain kaysa sa ilang mga hindi gaanong kanais-nais na lugar sa malapit, sulit naman ang kalidad nito. Ang manok ay palaging sariwa, maanghang, at masarap. Isa itong tunay na hiyas ng Southwest Side!

Sa unang pagkakataon na nakapasok ako sa negosyong ito, may dalawang parokyano na nanonood ng laro ng football sa business TV. Sinabi sa akin ng kahera na aabutin pa ng limang minuto ang pagkain ko. Masarap ang pagkain. Maliit lang ang balot.

Ito ang paborito kong lugar- ito ay malinis at lahat ay sobrang sariwa. Super linis sa loob. Karaniwan akong tumatawag nang maaga upang mag-order at handa na ito sa loob ng 15-20 minuto. Maliit/shared na parking lot, pero ang gusto ko sa lugar na ito ay may DRIVE THRU ito para makaalis ako kapag handa na ang pagkain! Kayla is super friendly and professional. Laging pumupunta dito!!

Dis.5 2025 Tinatangkilik ko ang lugar na ito mula nang ito ay bukas. Tinanggal ko ang five star ko. Pumupunta ako doon minsan o dalawang beses sa isang linggo pagkatapos ng trabaho ang taong nag-order ng telepono ay bastos at hindi ito ang unang pagkakataon. Umorder ako ng 10 wing na may light sauce na hindi bagong luto ang manok at mga lumang fries na may konting patak lang ng barbecue sauce. Hindi na magtatangkilik.

Umorder na ako. Tinawagan ako na handa na. May dalawang taong nagtatrabaho sa bintana na parehong nakatingin sa akin at naghihintay at patuloy pa rin sa paggamit ng kani-kanilang mga telepono. Naghintay ako ng 3-5 minuto at pagkatapos ay umalis na ako. Hindi ko alam kung ano ang problema pero hindi ako ang problema. Ang tanging dahilan kung bakit ko sila binigyan ng isang bituin ay para isulat ang post na ito!!!

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack Evanston
locations.address: 337 W Howard St, Evanston, IL 60202, USA
reviews:
I don't eat takeout nearly as much as I did pre-COVID so I'm not ordering from here as much. But when I do get a craving for takeout (usually no more than once a month), Harold's French fries with mild sauce and fried mushrooms is often what I want. I ordered from here yesterday, and per usual, these two items did not disappoint.

I've been inside of here MANY times. I like it. I didn't always see people wearing masks during COVID-19, but the one lady (sorta long bob with highlights, I think) who called everybody "sweetie/sweetheart" was so pleasant that I let it slide. I don't know where she is now. I've seen two other women post-COVID who look like they'd rather be anywhere else, but I liked THAT lady. She was the epitome of good vibes. All the guys I've encountered were friendly too. One gave me the nickname "Sides" because he caught on that I never order chicken or fish. (Vegetarian.) I haven't seen him in a long time either.

I would normally give this place 5 stars for the fries, mushrooms and those two, but I ordered cheese sticks that were clearly not cooked. The cheese was cold. The breaded part was lukewarm. It tasted like somebody defrosted them and just put them in the bag. I've gotten cheese sticks from there a number of times, and they were always coked well. Getting marinara sauce was only about 10% of the time though. They are always out.

That's the only reason I'm knocking a couple of stars off. I've yet to figure out how to make fried mushrooms as perfectly as they do. I've tried and failed, and then I order from the experts. So, it's not always perfect in there but I still like it.

First time here and everything was good from the service to the food !! If youâ€™re familiar with Haroldâ€™s you already know that EACH one is different. This one was good . I got a 4 wing dinner with hot sauce on everything. My only slight issue was coleslaw was a little juicy but still good !! If youâ€™re in the area I would suggest stopping by .

Everyone always talks about Haroldâ€™s Chicken! So I wanted to check them out for myself. I went with some friends to finally check them out. And I ordered the 6 piece chicken wings with mild sauce and a 4 piece chicken wing with lemon pepper. I requested that the wings be fried hard, and the wings were pretty good. I tried the French Fries. They were just okay. But overall Iâ€™m glad I went . The wings were tasty!!

Canadian here. Heard great things about Haroldâ€™s. :(
The chicken was salty. :( the liver was very livery (but i dont like liver so my 3 stars are just for the chicken and fries and cat fish) the fries were food. The cat fish I enjoyed!
It took about 30+ minutes to get our foodâ€¦.. i drove there.( which i didnt understand since doordash says you get it in 10?)
The person who took our order was friendly and helpful.
ğŸ˜¢

I grew up on Harold's Chicken. It is a continued favorite in my family. However, today's order at the Evanston Howard location was an unfortunate dining experience. The Cook was half an hour late. Once, I finally got my 6 wings and fries, one of the wings was completely black!  Not burnt, but BLACK!! Looked dangerous and or diseased! This took all the joy away. from enjoying the rest of my meal. I also want to mention that the nice young lady who took my order and seasoned my food was GREAT! I didn't take back the BLACK wing bc ( let's face it) I am sure they would not have provided a customer friendly remedy. This is verified by all the handwritten signs they have posted in the restaurant (i.e. check your food before you leave...). I was not happy with this visit. If there is a next visit, I will open the bag and check every EVERYTHING!!! I am sadden it has come down to this!!

Hindi ako kumakain ng takeout nang kasing dami ng dati bago ang COVID kaya hindi ako masyadong nag-oorder dito. Pero kapag nag-crave ako ng takeout (karaniwan ay hindi hihigit sa isang beses sa isang buwan), madalas kong gusto ang French fries ni Harold na may mild sauce at pritong mushroom. Umorder ako dito kahapon, at gaya ng dati, hindi ako nabigo sa dalawang item na ito.

Maraming beses na akong nakapunta rito. Gusto ko ito. Hindi ko laging nakikitang may mga taong nakasuot ng mask noong COVID-19, pero yung isang babae (medyo mahaba ang bob na may highlights, sa palagay ko) na tumatawag sa lahat ng "sweetie/sweetheart" ay napakabait kaya hinayaan ko na lang. Hindi ko alam kung nasaan siya ngayon. May nakita akong dalawa pang babae pagkatapos ng COVID na mukhang mas gusto nilang pumunta sa ibang lugar, pero gusto ko ang babaeng IYON. Siya ang huwaran ng good vibes. Lahat ng mga lalaking nakilala ko ay palakaibigan din. Ang isa ay nagbigay sa akin ng palayaw na "Sides" dahil naintindihan niya na hindi ako nag-oorder ng manok o isda. (Vegetarian.) Matagal ko na rin siyang hindi nakikita.

Karaniwan kong binibigyan ang lugar na ito ng 5 bituin para sa fries, mushroom at sa dalawa, pero umorder ako ng cheese sticks na malinaw na hindi pa luto. Malamig ang keso. Malamig ang breading part. Parang may nag-defrost at nilagay lang sa bag. Nakakuha na ako ng cheese sticks mula roon nang ilang beses, at lagi silang naluto nang maayos. Pero mga 10% lang ng oras ang nakukuha kong marinara sauce. Lagi silang wala.

Iyon lang ang dahilan kung bakit ako nakakakuha ng ilang bituin. Hindi ko pa alam kung paano gumawa ng pritong mushroom nang kasing perpekto ng ginagawa nila. Sinubukan ko na at nabigo, at pagkatapos ay umorder ako mula sa mga eksperto. Kaya, hindi laging perpekto doon pero gusto ko pa rin ito.

First time here and everything was good from the service to the food!! Kung pamilyar ka sa Harold's alam mo na ang BAWAT isa ay iba. Ang isang ito ay mabuti. Kumuha ako ng 4 wing dinner na may mainit na sarsa sa lahat. Ang kaunting isyu ko lang ay ang coleslaw ay medyo makatas ngunit maganda pa rin !! Kung ikaw ay nasa lugar na iminumungkahi kong dumaan sa .

Laging pinag-uusapan ng lahat ang Harold's Chicken! Kaya gusto ko silang subukan mismo. Sumama ako sa ilang kaibigan para subukan din. At umorder ako ng 6 na piraso ng chicken wings na may banayad na sarsa at 4 na piraso ng chicken wing na may lemon pepper. Hiniling ko na iprito nang husto ang mga pakpak, at masarap naman ang mga pakpak. Sinubukan ko ang French Fries. Okay lang naman. Pero sa pangkalahatan, natutuwa akong pumunta ako. Masarap ang mga pakpak!!

Canadian dito. Nakarinig ng magagandang bagay tungkol kay Harold. :(
Ang manok ay maalat. :( sobrang livery ang atay (pero i dont like liver so my 3 stars are just for the chicken and fries and cat fish) food ang fries. Yung cat fish na enjoy ko!
Tumagal ng humigit-kumulang 30+ minuto upang makuha ang aming pagkainâ€¦.. nagmaneho ako roon.(na hindi ko naintindihan dahil sinabi ng doordash na makukuha mo ito sa 10?)
Magiliw at matulungin ang taong kumuha ng aming order.
ğŸ˜¢

Lumaki ako sa Harold's Chicken. Ito ay patuloy na paborito sa aking pamilya. Gayunpaman, ang order ngayon sa lokasyon ng Evanston Howard ay isang hindi magandang karanasan sa kainan. The Cook was half an hour late. Minsan, sa wakas nakuha ko na ang 6 na pakpak at fries ko, ang isa sa mga pakpak ay ganap na itim!  Hindi nasunog, kundi ITIM!! Mukhang mapanganib at o may sakit! Inalis nito ang lahat ng kagalakan. mula sa pag-enjoy sa natitirang pagkain ko. Gusto ko ring banggitin na ang magaling na binibini na kumuha ng aking order at tinimplahan ang aking pagkain ay GRABE! Hindi ko binawi ang BLACK wing bc ( aminin na natin) I am sure hindi sila magbibigay ng customer friendly na remedy. Ito ay na-verify ng lahat ng sulat-kamay na mga karatula na kanilang nai-post sa restaurant (ibig sabihin, suriin ang iyong pagkain bago ka umalis...). Hindi ako natuwa sa pagbisitang ito. locations.name: Harold's Chicken Sports Bar
locations.address: 425 15th St, Moline, IL 61265, USA
reviews: I came out of town and was pleasantly surprised by how good the food was. Our server was really nice and gave great recommendations on what we should eat. The corn bites were really sweet and delicious. I would definitely recommend this place. I also love the music selection and the large number of TVâ€™s in the restaurant. It wasnâ€™t too loud which I really liked.

Foods are overpriced compared to the service and waiting time. Most of food are not taste bad, but itâ€™s definitely not taste like the one had in Chicago. Big issue is I ordered everything for Togo, waited over 1 hour to get the food, then I checked they forgot to put cookie. So I went back for cookies, and no one want to serve me anymore. I was standing over the bar for another 10 mins, finally have someoneâ€™s attention, but one of kitchen staffs said she needs 30-40 mins to get cookie done, but she can get me biscuit instead. You know what still waiting for another 15 mins. I went to the restaurant and placed order at 4pm and got everything correctly around 6pm. Itâ€™s definitely worth to waste time there unless you have nothing else to do.
Also, when I finally can have the food, I found they gave me sweet sour sauce instead the hot sauce I was asking. Side of coleslaw is not even half of the small sauce container

Good food.  No need to get fancy come in eat and enjoy.  90% finger style food.  But the flavor and quality is worth it.  Will be back.  Nice bar selection as well with draft beer.  Will be back with friends to enjoy again.

So glad we went here one evening.   The staff was accommodating even though we had a large group.   The chicken was delicious!  They recently soft open so they only had a few menu items.  But there is no doubt the rest of the menu will be delicious.   Excellent service.

Wow I gotta say, Haroldâ€™s in moline has some of the best fried chicken wings I think Iâ€™ve ever had! Definitely get em with the lemon pepper and that hot sauce!! Wow is all I gotta say, stuff is magical. All the staff were awesome and super friendly. Talked with the owner for a bit while waiting for our food and you can tell this guy is very passionate about his restaurant and the Haroldâ€™s brand. Great vibe in the restaurant and a really cool bar. The drinks were delicious and the bartender was super friendly and provided top notch service. Canâ€™t wait to come back, and definitely will. I canâ€™t recommend this place more! Iâ€™ve heard lots of people complain about the price, but Iâ€™m here to tell you that itâ€™s 100% worth every penny youâ€™ll pay. Absolutely delicious and a great addition to the quad cities restaurant scene!

Lumabas ako ng bayan at nagulat ako sa sarap ng pagkain. Ang aming server ay talagang maganda at nagbigay ng magagandang rekomendasyon sa kung ano ang dapat naming kainin. Matamis at masarap talaga ang kagat ng mais. Talagang irerekomenda ko ang lugar na ito. Gusto ko rin ang pagpili ng musika at ang malaking bilang ng mga TV sa restaurant. Hindi ito masyadong malakas na talagang nagustuhan ko.

Ang mga pagkain ay sobrang mahal kumpara sa serbisyo at oras ng paghihintay. Karamihan sa mga pagkain ay hindi masama ang lasa, ngunit tiyak na hindi ito lasa tulad ng sa Chicago. Big issue is I ordered everything for Togo, waited over 1 hour para makuha ang pagkain, then I checked they forgot to put cookie. Kaya bumalik ako para kumuha ng cookies, at wala nang gustong maghatid sa akin. Ako ay nakatayo sa ibabaw ng bar para sa isa pang 10 min, sa wakas ay may atensyon ng isang tao, ngunit sinabi ng isa sa mga tauhan ng kusina na kailangan niya ng 30-40 minuto upang makapagluto ng cookie, ngunit maaari niya akong bigyan ng biskwit sa halip. Alam mo kung ano pa ang naghihintay para sa isa pang 15 minuto. Pumunta ako sa restaurant at nag-order ng 4pm at nakuha ko ang lahat nang tama bandang 6pm. Talagang sulit na mag-aksaya ng oras doon maliban kung wala kang ibang gagawin.
Isa pa, nang sa wakas ay makakain na ako, nalaman kong binigyan nila ako ng matamis na sarsa sa halip na mainit na sarsa na hinihingi ko. Ang gilid ng coleslaw ay wala pa sa kalahati ng maliit na lalagyan ng sauce

Masarap na pagkain. Hindi na kailangang magpaganda, kumain at mag-enjoy. 90% finger style na pagkain. Pero sulit ang lasa at kalidad. Babalik ako. Maganda rin ang mga bar selection na may draft beer. Babalik ako kasama ang mga kaibigan para mag-enjoy ulit.

Kaya natutuwa kaming pumunta dito isang gabi.   Accommodating ang staff kahit na marami kaming grupo.   Ang sarap ng manok!  Kamakailan lang ay nag-soft open sila kaya kaunti lang ang menu item nila.  Ngunit walang duda na ang natitirang bahagi ng menu ay magiging masarap.   Napakahusay na serbisyo.

Wow I gotta say, Harold's in moline has some of the best fried chicken wings I think I have ever had! Siguradong kunin sila ng lemon pepper at ang mainit na sarsa!! Wow ang lahat ng kailangan kong sabihin, ang mga bagay ay mahiwagang. Ang lahat ng mga kawani ay kahanga-hanga at sobrang palakaibigan. Nakipag-usap saglit sa may-ari habang naghihintay ng aming pagkain at masasabi mong napakahilig ng taong ito sa kanyang restaurant at sa tatak ng Harold. Mahusay na vibe sa restaurant at talagang cool na bar. Masarap ang mga inumin at super friendly ang bartender at nagbigay ng top notch service. Hindi makapaghintay na bumalik, at tiyak na babalik. Hindi ko mairerekomenda ang lugar na ito nang higit pa! Marami akong narinig na nagreklamo tungkol sa presyo, ngunit narito ako para sabihin sa iyo na 100% ang halaga ng bawat sentimo na babayaran mo. Talagang masarap at isang magandang karagdagan sa quad city restaurant scene!

reviews:
I didn't get her name but she was AMAZING. Her way of communication, recommendation(s) for food to get. Very.....very good service and I will make an attempt to come here again either WITH food or to get food before I head back to Kansas!

Definitely recommend this location. You have friendly service and good food (the cook has been cooking for a good 40+yrs so you have some experience in there!

Chicken was fresh I ordered two 10piece fried hard lemon pepper mild sauce. Couldn't taste the signature the lemon pepper at all you might have to say heavy. We ordered fried pickles good, large fries with mild sauce and mac and cheese BIG MISTAKE!! Please take it off the menu this KRAFT POWDER CHEESE is repulsive! Restaurant looks clean . That's it that's all .

Assalamualaikum and SubhanAllah I had the pleasure to run I to brother Adam the owner..this is a AUTHENTIC HALAL DHABIHA chicken. A seasoned veteran in food service and serving the nwi...no swine on the site...I'm going with the 12 pc boneless hot let's see how they are!...is not Chicago Harold's but NYC Harold's...I would say more seasoning and make it crispy not a fan of the cobbler but I'm about to out some ice cream on it...this is sharks with real halal meat. A few improvements and I'll be here daily

1â˜…] Skip this Haroldâ€™s (Merrillville, IN)

Grew up on Haroldâ€™s, so I know the real taste. This ainâ€™t it. Chicken came out bland and offâ€”mild sauce couldnâ€™t save it.

Big red flag: theyâ€™re dropping piping-hot, greasy food straight into a polystyrene (Styrofoam) clamshell and closing the lid. That traps steam (soggy fries/chicken) and hot oil on foam isnâ€™t food-safeâ€”polystyrene isnâ€™t for hot, oily food and itâ€™s not microwave-safe. Iâ€™m not eating that.

Alsoâ€”during my visit there was not one single B.L.K. person on the line or at the register. Not one. For a brand born in our culture, that matters.

Bottom line: donâ€™t spend here. When this spot gets replaced, letâ€™s get a real Haroldâ€™s backâ€”run by our people, seasoned right, and packaged right.

The fried chicken and fries was excellent. The chicken itself is easily like a 7.5 or 8/10. The establishment itself is a little run down looking. I would expect this for it's location and sometimes I find that to be a good sign that the food will be good. The thing that seriously disappointed me was that I ordered mac and cheese and it was literally Kraft mac and cheese from the box. The mac was room temperature and I found a hair in it and it looked like a pubic hair. The cashier was very nice. I may go back and try the fried fish, but if I find another hair in my food I'm filing a complaint to the health department.

Hindi ko nakuha ang pangalan niya pero ang galing niya. Ang paraan niya ng pakikipag-usap, mga rekomendasyon para sa pagkain na ihahain. Napakahusay ng serbisyo at susubukan kong bumalik dito nang may dalang pagkain o para bumili ng pagkain bago ako bumalik sa Kansas!

Lubos na inirerekomenda ang lugar na ito. Mabait ang serbisyo at masarap ang pagkain (ang kusinero ay nagluluto na nang mahigit 40 taon kaya may karanasan ka na roon!)

Sariwa ang manok. Umorder ako ng dalawang 10 piraso ng pritong hard lemon pepper, mild sauce. Hindi ko talaga matikman ang signature lemon pepper, baka sabihin mong mabigat. Masarap ang umorder kami ng pritong atsara, malalaking fries na may mild sauce, at mac and cheese. MALAKING PAGKAKAMALI!! Pakitanggal na lang sa menu, nakakadiri ang KRAFT POWDER CHEESE na 'yan! Mukhang malinis ang restaurant. Iyon lang.

Assalamualaikum and SubhanAllah I had the pleasure to run I to kuya Adam the owner..this is a AUTHENTIC HALAL DHABIHA chicken. Isang batikang beterano sa food service at nagse-serve sa nwi...walang baboy sa site...Pupunta ako sa 12 pc boneless hot tingnan natin kung paano sila!...ay hindi Chicago Harold's kundi NYC Harold's...I would say more seasoning and make it crispy not a fan of the cobbler but I'm about to out some real ice cream is sharks on it...this halal mearts on it...this sharks. Ilang pagpapabuti at pupunta ako dito araw-araw

1â˜…] Laktawan itong Harold's (Merrillville, IN)

Lumaki kay Harold, kaya alam ko ang totoong lasa. Hindi ito. Ang manok ay lumabas na mura at walaâ€”hindi ito maililigtas ng banayad na sarsa.

Malaking pulang bandila: ibinabagsak nila ang mainit-init, mamantika na pagkain diretso sa isang polystyrene (Styrofoam) clamshell at isinasara ang takip. Ang mga bitag ng singaw (soggy fries/manok) at mainit na mantika sa foam ay hindi ligtas sa pagkainâ€”ang polystyrene ay hindi para sa mainit, mamantika na pagkain at hindi ito ligtas sa microwave. Hindi ako kumakain niyan.

Gayundinâ€”sa aking pagbisita ay wala ni isang B.L.K. tao sa linya o sa rehistro. Hindi isa. Para sa isang tatak na ipinanganak sa ating kultura, mahalaga iyon.

Bottom line: huwag gumastos dito. Kapag napalitan na ang lugar na ito, makuha natin ang isang tunay na Harold's backâ€”na pinamamahalaan ng ating mga tao, napapanahong tama, at nakabalot nang tama.

Napakasarap ng fried chicken at fries. Ang manok mismo ay madaling tulad ng isang 7.5 o 8/10. Medyo run down looking ang mismong establishment. I would expect this for it's location and sometimes I find that to be a good sign na magiging masarap ang pagkain. Ang bagay na seryosong nabigo sa akin ay nag-order ako ng mac at keso at ito ay literal na Kraft mac at keso mula sa kahon. Ang mac ay temperatura ng silid at nakita ko ang isang buhok sa loob nito at ito ay parang isang pubic hair. Napakabait ng cashier. Maaari akong bumalik at subukan ang pritong isda, ngunit kung makakita ako ng isa pang buhok sa aking pagkain, nagsampa ako ng reklamo sa departamento ng kalusugan.

Ang lugar na ito ay talagang kakila-kilabot. Ang pagkain, pagpepresyo, serbisyo sa customer, at maging ang lokasyonâ€”nakakatakot lahat. Nag-order kami para sa 10-piece wing special na may lemon pepper seasoning sa mga pakpak at mild sauce sa gilid. Sinabi sa amin na magiging handa ito sa loob ng 20 minuto. Pagdating namin, hindi lang nakahanda ang pagkain, nilalaglag lang nila ang fries. Nang sa wakas ay nakauwi na kami, napagtanto namin na hindi nila kasama ang mild sauce. Ang mga fries ay kulang sa luto, at ang lemon pepper seasoning ay itinapon nang hindi pantay sa isang lugar sa mga pakpak. Tumawag kami upang ipaalam sa kanila ang tungkol sa mga isyu, at ang lalaki sa telepono ay nakikipagtalo sa halip na humihingi ng tawad. Nagbayad kami ng mahigit $21 para sa 10 hindi magandang pagkakagawa ng mga pakpak at sa totoo lang, ito ay isang kumpletong pag-aaksaya. Hindi na sila makakakuha ng isa pang dolyar mula sa akin.
Hindi ka lang bukas tuwing Huwebes ng hapon ng 2pm, habang binabasa ko ang mga review na tinugon ng may-ari sa isang customer sa pamamagitan ng pag-downplay sa ibang Harold's smh.

Ilang beses akong tumawag para mag-order pero wala akong nakuhang sagot.... Pumunta doon at dalawa lang ang tao sa loob at pareho na silang nag-order.... Nakatayo ako sa bintana sa loob ng sampung minuto at ang batang babae na kumukuha ng order ay hindi kailanman lumapit sa bintanaâ€¦.. sa halip ay nagpasya siyang magpatugtog ng musika sa likodâ€¦. Tumayo ako roon at tinawagan ang numero para tingnan kung kukuha sila... Wala akong narinig na ring ng telepono.... Ang lalaking nagluluto sa likod ay nakatayong tumatango.... Naghila ng takip ang babae para hindi namin makita... Naglakad na ako palabas ng lugar... Hindi ko inirerekomenda ito Harolds

reviews: If it were not for the couple chicken wings that didn't really look like wings, the food is great! I bought an 8 Wing but only 6 of them were completely edible. Those 6 wings though were cooked to perfection. Seasoned just right. I wish all plates looked like a plate they would personally eat.

Every time I come in here I have  a good experience! Just moved back to the city And initially was not coming here due to the location of it. I just so happened to come one day and Iâ€™m so happy I did. Itâ€™s an older lady in here. Sheâ€™s extremely nice and always welcoming. When I come here, I come for two and sometimes three different houses. My food is always fresh and fast. So proud of my Black peopleğŸ’ªğŸ¾ğŸ’•ğŸ’• Woord of advice, order online

Food was on point. You get everything you are supposed to get for a wing dinner. (Chicken, crinkle fries, bread and coleslaw) They put a good amount of sauce nothing is left dry. Chicken was fresh! Excellent portion size. I will be returning. Also exceptional customer service. Thank you for doing order number 34 on 9/7/25 the way itâ€™s supposed to be done! I will be back. Compliments to you all, I felt like family.

To Management â€¦THANK YOU! Iâ€™m back for an update on this location because they truly deserve it! Iâ€™m grateful that I donâ€™t have to always go outside of my community to get the great food experience I deserve!
The food was delicious! The staff were amazing and she great us with a smile. It is a small location with a big personality.
